T02TD2516E:5a-24: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2516E:5a-25: dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2516E:5a-26: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD2516E:5b-0: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'khor ba'i @5b rgya mtsho las yang dag par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:5b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra po dhi tsitta p'u da me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:5b-2: sgeg mo'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:5b-3: sems can thams cad yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par 'byor cing phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'dod pa tsam la rag lus par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzrod bha ba d'a na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:5b-4: rdo rje phreng ba ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:5b-5: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:5b-6: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par bral bar gyur cig / dge ba bcu'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' thams cad dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra ma h'a bo dhi h'a ra sh'i la p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:5b-7: rdo rje glu mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:5b-8: sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad kyis lus la yang dag par brgyan par byas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:5b-9: rtag tu phan tshun 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T02TD2516E:5b-10: zhe 'gras pa med par zhugs shing ;
T02TD2516E:5b-11: mig dang yid mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:5b-12: chos zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nutta ra ma h'a dharma aa ba bo dhi kshanti p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:5b-13: rdo rje gar mkhan ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:5b-14: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:5b-15: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dang ldan pa dang /
T02TD2516E:5b-16: sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su gzhol zhing /
T02TD2516E:5b-17: 'khor ba yongs su mi spong ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa na snga ra aa pa ri tyam k'u nutta ra ma h'a b'irya p'a ra mi ta p'u dza ma gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:5b-18: me tog gi phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:5b-19: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang bral bar gyur cig / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-2: mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-3: rigs pa thams cad dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra soo ksha bi ha ra dhya na p'a ra mi t'a p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sapha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-4: bdug spos kyi phyag rgya bcings la ;
T02TD2516E:6a-5: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:6a-6: sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-7: ye shes rnams dang yang dag par ldan par gyur cig / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob ste /
T02TD2516E:6a-8: bzo dang bstan bcos thams cad shes shing sgyu rtsal dang ldan la /
T02TD2516E:6a-9: gsang ba'i cho ga shes pa dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-10: de kho na nyid mthong ste nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-11: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-12: shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig / aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nutta ra kle sha tstshe da sarba dharm'a: sa manta dzny'a na ma h'a pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra sapha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-13: lus kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:6a-14: bdag nyid phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs drung du phyin par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2516E:6a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-16: thams cad du lce brgya stong phrag snyed kyi sgo nas mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pas mchod par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2516E:6a-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka niry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bsam pa gcig pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2516E:6a-19: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2516E:6a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta ni ry'a ta na p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-21: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:6a-24: smon pa med pa'i rnam par lhag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2516E:6a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2516E:6a-27: de ltar mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2516E:6b-0: @6b bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste //
T02TD2516E:6b-1: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid 'bul gyis /
T02TD2516E:6b-3: rnam pa thams cad du so sor bzhes su gsol /
T02TD2516E:6b-4: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes brjod la /
T02TD2516E:6b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
T02TD2516E:6b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgud pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bde ba nyid dang yid bde ba nyid kyis mi'i mchog sangs rgyas su tshe 'di nyid la gyur cig / bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis //
T02TD2516E:6b-7: 'jig rten du ni myur du sangs rgyas shog //
T02TD2516E:6b-8: 'grol phan phyir chos rnams ston bgyid cing //
T02TD2516E:6b-9: sems can sdug bsngal mang pos gzir las sgrol //
T02TD2516E:6b-10: zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la /
T02TD2516E:6b-11: sdom pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:6b-12: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams ;
T02TD2516E:6b-13: / byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2516E:6b-14: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2516E:6b-15: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:6b-16: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02TD2516E:6b-17: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02TD2516E:6b-18: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2516E:6b-19: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2516E:6b-20: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:6b-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2516E:6b-22: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02TD2516E:6b-23: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:6b-24: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02TD2516E:6b-25: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2516E:6b-26: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2516E:6b-27: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:6b-28: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:6b-29: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2516E:6b-30: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2516E:6b-31: nyin re bzhin ni dus drug tu //
T02TD2516E:6b-32: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2516E:6b-33: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2516E:6b-34: padma'i rigs chen dag pa la //
T02TD2516E:7a-2: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:7a-3: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2516E:7a-4: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2516E:7a-5: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:7a-6: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02TD2516E:7a-7: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2516E:7a-8: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02TD2516E:7a-9: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2516E:7a-10: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02TD2516E:7a-11: ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:7a-12: ma bskal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:7a-13: dbugs ma dbyung ba dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02TD2516E:7a-14: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2516E:7a-16: de nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2516E:7a-17: phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2516E:7a-18: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya ste //
T02TD2516E:7a-19: thal mo dam du bsdams pa las //
T02TD2516E:7a-20: sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni //
T02TD2516E:7a-21: rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te //
T02TD2516E:7a-22: rab tu bsdam phyir rdo rje bsdams //
T02TD2516E:7a-23: badzra aanydza li zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo'i sngags so //
T02TD2516E:7a-24: badzra bandha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa ste /
T02TD2516E:7a-25: badzra bandha trat ces brjod cing snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-27: zhes bya bas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:7a-28: aa: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-29: babs pa de yang 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-30: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba /
T02TD2516E:7a-31: sh'a shva to me bha ba /
T02TD2516E:7a-33: aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhimme pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02TD2516E:7a-34: badzra mushti zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:7a-35: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-38: aom sarba p'a pam a'a karsha na bi sho dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
T02TD2516E:7a-39: ces bya ba dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan 'gro thams cad dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-40: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
T02TD2516E:7a-41: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas su //
T02TD2516E:7a-42: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
T02TD2516E:7a-43: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-44: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya /
T02TD2516E:7a-46: bandha ni pr'a mo ksha ya /
T02TD2516E:7a-49: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya tra tva /
T02TD2516E:7a-50: ces brjod cing sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:7a-51: sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7a-52: rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas te //
T02TD2516E:7a-53: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02TD2516E:7b-0: @7b tha ma bzhi yi rtse mo sbyar //
T02TD2516E:7b-1: sdig pa 'joms par grags pa yin //
T02TD2516E:7b-2: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:7b-3: de rnams kyi sngags lan bdun bdun brjod de /
T02TD2516E:7b-4: 'dis rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7b-5: aom badzra mu: de ltar byas pas phyag rgya thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ba dang /
T02TD2516E:7b-6: 'di byas pas rnal 'byor pa bskal pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:7b-7: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su rang gi lha'i snying po dam tshig gis bris la /
T02TD2516E:7b-8: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7b-9: de nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa /
T02TD2516E:7b-10: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:7b-11: yang de'i steng du de nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:7b-12: yi ge ka la sogs pa skar ma'i rnam pa lta bu yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD2516E:7b-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs can gnyis pa nyid du bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:7b-14: de las byung ba gang yin pa de la ni /
T02TD2516E:7b-15: yang de'i snying po dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang bcas par bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:7b-16: gzhan dag gi ni rdo rje las byung ba'i rang gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:7b-17: de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i dbus su rang gi snying po bkod la /
T02TD2516E:7b-18: rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:7b-19: ganda& ham zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2516E:7b-20: badzro& ham zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T02TD2516E:7b-21: rang gi snying po yang bzlas shing //
T02TD2516E:7b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings rang gi phyag rgyal zhugs par bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:7b-23: de nas badzra dh'a tu zhes zlos shing phyag rgya'i gzugs de sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor bas /
T02TD2516E:7b-24: rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms la /
T02TD2516E:7b-25: snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor zhing /
T02TD2516E:7b-26: badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:7b-27: de nas rang gi sngags kyis rang gi lha'i sku de nyid du bsams la /
T02TD2516E:7b-29: ma h'a sa ma ya satva ham /
T02TD2516E:7b-30: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:7b-31: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:7b-33: de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02TD2516E:8a-2: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam /
T02TD2516E:8a-3: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2516E:8a-4: rang rang gi snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:8a-6: yang rang gi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje glu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
T02TD2516E:8a-7: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod de /
T02TD2516E:8a-8: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:8a-9: de nyid gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba blang ste /
T02TD2516E:8a-10: sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:8a-11: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:8a-12: phreng ba de yang pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi spyi bor dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-13: de nas phreng ba de aom pra ti grihna sva mi mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-14: de nas aom badzra satva sa yan te ha tsa ksh'u da gha ta tang par /
T02TD2516E:8a-15: aung gha ta ya ti sarba aaksho /
T02TD2516E:8a-16: badzra tsakshur nutta ra he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-17: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:8a-18: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du /
T02TD2516E:8a-19: rang gi lus la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-20: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:8a-21: tishtha badzra zhes zlos zhing snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-22: de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02TD2516E:8a-23: badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'dis chus dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-24: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pas blang bar bya ste ;
T02TD2516E:8a-25: rdo rje thal mo las byung ba //
T02TD2516E:8a-26: mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
T02TD2516E:8a-27: mdzub mo'i rtse mo bkug nas ni //
T02TD2516E:8a-28: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar //
T02TD2516E:8a-29: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
T02TD2516E:8a-31: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri n'i aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya bas spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8a-32: de nyid las dbu ma rdo rjer byas pa 'di dang /
T02TD2516E:8a-33: aom badzra badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:8a-34: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8b-0: @8b gung mo gnyis bkug ste rin po che 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang /
T02TD2516E:8b-1: aom ratna badzri ni h'um zhes bya bas rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya can bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:8b-2: gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung padma 'dra bar byas pa 'di dang /
T02TD2516E:8b-3: aom dharma badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:8b-4: ltag par 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya can bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:8b-6: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:8b-7: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag /
T02TD2516E:8b-8: rgyas bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8b-9: 'di thams cad kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya las byung ba yin no //
T02TD2516E:8b-10: de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:8b-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar mdud pa bcing pa'i tshul gyis go bgo bar bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:8b-12: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02TD2516E:8b-18: rgyab dang dpral ba'i steng du mdud la /
T02TD2516E:8b-19: dar dbyangs bcing ba'i tshul du byas te /
T02TD2516E:8b-20: sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha ma la sogs pa nas bkrol te /
T02TD2516E:8b-21: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
T02TD2516E:8b-22: badzra tu shya ho zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o ;
T02TD2516E:8b-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2516E:8b-25: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2516E:8b-26: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2516E:8b-27: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2516E:8b-28: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya satvam zhes bya ba 'dis rang gi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8b-29: rang gi rdo rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje ni sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo lnga pa gser la sogs pa las byas pa'o //
T02TD2516E:8b-30: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rdo rje ni tshad nges pa med de /
T02TD2516E:8b-31: rtse mo lnga pa cung zad gyes pa 'od zar dang bcas pa /
T02TD2516E:8b-32: cha gsum pa'i chang zung can /
T02TD2516E:8b-33: padma r'a ga la sogs pa las bya'o //
T02TD2516E:8b-34: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i yang de nyid yin no //
T02TD2516E:8b-35: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ni gnam lcags shin tu sbyangs pa las byas pa /
T02TD2516E:8b-36: sor bcu gnyis pa'i tshang la rtse mo lnga po rno ba /
T02TD2516E:8b-37: rdo rje de yang chang zung cha gsum pa dang ldan pa yin no //
T02TD2516E:8b-38: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba yang /
T02TD2516E:9a-1: de rang gi mgo bor gzhag la /
T02TD2516E:9a-2: aom badzra sa tva tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2516E:9a-3: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba 'dis blang par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:9a-4: rang gi ming gang yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-6: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2516E:9a-7: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
T02TD2516E:9a-8: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2516E:9a-9: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2516E:9a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha /
T02TD2516E:9a-12: dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:9a-13: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-14: de ltar bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-15: de la dang por re zhig rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gcig tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:9a-16: de nas rang gi lus la sa ma ya aa zhes zlos shing /
T02TD2516E:9a-17: lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:9a-18: rang gi gnas na gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2516E:9a-19: sngags de nyid kyis mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
T02TD2516E:9a-20: badzra satva aa zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje'i bdag nyid du dbab par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:9a-21: badzro& ham zhes bya ba 'dis de'i nga rgyal yang bsgoms la /
T02TD2516E:9a-22: badzra satv'a ham zhes bya bas de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:9a-23: de la de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas /
T02TD2516E:9a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2516E:9a-29: badzra satva dri shya zhes bya ba 'dis blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-30: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:9a-31: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2516E:9a-32: rang gi snying ga'i zla bar /
T02TD2516E:9a-35: bcing pa dang dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-36: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2516E:9a-37: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
T02TD2516E:9a-38: sa ma ya satvam aa ham zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2516E:9a-39: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom /
T02TD2516E:9a-40: badzra satva zhes bya ba'i snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:9a-41: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9a-42: de bzhin du rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2516E:9b-0: de @9b phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid du snying po 'dis dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:9b-28: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:9b-47: badzra nri tya ka ra palla bo ham /
T02TD2516E:9b-56: phyag rgya'i gzungs de yang rang rang gi lha'i skur bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:9b-84: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2516E:9b-85: snying po 'di rnams kyis 'di nyid du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:9b-87: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba'o //
T02TD2516E:9b-88: badzra aam ku sha dza: badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2516E:9b-91: de nas rang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:9b-92: snying po 'di rnams kyis blta bar bya ste ;
T02TD2516E:10a-5: badzra a'a lo ke dri shya /
T02TD2516E:10a-7: badzra aam ku sha dri shya /
T02TD2516E:10a-10: badzra a'a be sha dri shya //
T02TD2516E:10a-11: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:10a-14: gnas ji lta bar dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:10a-18: sa ma ya satvam zhes brjod pas /
T02TD2516E:10a-19: rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni //
T02TD2516E:10a-20: sa ma ya satvam aa ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2516E:10a-21: der bdag sems pa'i lus su bsgom //
T02TD2516E:10a-22: de la snying ga'i g-yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-23: g-yon phyogs su ni chags pa sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD2516E:10a-24: snying ga'i rgyab tu ni legs pa sku mdog ljang gu /
T02TD2516E:10a-25: dpral bar ni rin chen sku mdog ser po /
T02TD2516E:10a-26: mgo bo'i rgyab tu rdo rje gzi brjid nyi ma'i mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-27: phrag pa gnyis su ni rdo rje dpal nam mkha'i mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-28: so'i phreng ba gnyis su ni bzhad pa dung dang padma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2516E:10a-29: lkog mar ni chos dkar dmar /
T02TD2516E:10a-30: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du ni rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs /
T02TD2516E:10a-31: lte bar ni rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-32: lce la ni smra ba zangs kyi mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-33: spyi por ni rdo rje las sna tshogs pa'i mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-34: nam tshong du rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog can /
T02TD2516E:10a-35: khar ni rdo rje gnod sbyin nag po /
T02TD2516E:10a-36: dku gnyis su ni khu tshur ser po /
T02TD2516E:10a-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon phyogs su ni sgeg mo dkar ba /
T02TD2516E:10a-38: rdo rje rin chen gyi g-yon phyogs su ni phreng ba ma ser po /
T02TD2516E:10a-39: rdo rje chos kyi g-yon phyogs su ni glu mkhan ma dkar dmar /
T02TD2516E:10a-40: rdo rje sna tshogs kyi g-yon logs su ni gar mkhan ma ljang gu /
T02TD2516E:10a-41: sgrub pa po'i gsang ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su ni bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo /
T02TD2516E:10a-42: mgo bor ni me tog ma ser mo /
T02TD2516E:10a-43: mig gnyis su ni mar me ma dmar skya //
T02TD2516E:10a-44: nu ma dang brang dang snying gar ni byug pa ma ljang gu lag pa g-yas su ni lcags kyu ma dkar po /
T02TD2516E:10a-45: lag pa g-yon par ni zhags pa ma ser po /
T02TD2516E:10a-46: byin pa g-yas par ni lcags sgrog ma dmar skya /
T02TD2516E:10a-47: byin pa g-yon par ni dril bu ma ljang gu'o /
T02TD2516E:10a-48: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:10b-2: badzra r'a ga / aom badzra r'a ga ho //
T02TD2516E:10b-9: badzra ke tu aom badzra ke tu tram /
T02TD2516E:10b-41: aom badzra a'a lo ke hr'im:/
T02TD2516E:10b-45: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02TD2516E:10b-51: aom badzra a'a be sha aa /
T02TD2516E:10b-52: de nas rang gi lus dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku la /
T02TD2516E:10b-53: rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2516E:10b-56: yid kyis legs par sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2516E:10b-57: sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya //
T02TD2516E:10b-58: de nas sbyor ba 'dis de rnams rang gi dam tshig dang /
T02TD2516E:10b-61: phyag rgya chen pos rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:10b-62: rdo rje dbyings kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:10b-68: de nas badzra dh'a tu zhes lan gsum brjod la /
T02TD2516E:10b-69: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags lan gsum du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:10b-70: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:10b-73: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:10b-75: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: //
T02TD2516E:10b-78: aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:10b-79: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i spyi'i nying po lan gsum gsum brjod par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:10b-80: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba mi bskyod pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:10b-81: aom badzra ratna tr'am zhes bya ba rin chen 'byung ldan gyi snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:11a-1: dharma hr'i:zhes bya ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:11a-2: aom badzra karma kam zhes bya ba don yod grub pa'i snying po yang lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-3: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-4: de'i rjes la satva badzri aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02TD2516E:11a-7: spyi bo byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2516E:11a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba la /
T02TD2516E:11a-9: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-10: ratna badzri aa dhi tishtha sra m'am zhes bya bas /
T02TD2516E:11a-11: rdo rje rin chen ma ni dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rin po che'i rnam par ro //
T02TD2516E:11a-12: dharma badzra aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma lkog ma'i phyogs su rdo rje padma'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-13: karma badzri aa dhi tashthi sva m'am zhes bya bas rdo rje las ma spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang ldan par bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zlos pa pos ni /
T02TD2516E:11a-15: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed nas /
T02TD2516E:11a-16: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-17: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:11a-21: spyi bor byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2516E:11a-22: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams 'byung ste //
T02TD2516E:11a-23: dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02TD2516E:11a-24: rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na //
T02TD2516E:11a-25: de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi //
T02TD2516E:11a-26: bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya //
T02TD2516E:11a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la //
T02TD2516E:11a-28: gung mo myu gu ltar bsnyams bsgreng //
T02TD2516E:11a-29: gung mo nang du gzhi bas pa ni //
T02TD2516E:11a-30: sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad //
T02TD2516E:11a-31: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02TD2516E:11a-33: sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD2516E:11a-34: de bzhin mdzub mo bkug pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11a-35: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi //
T02TD2516E:11a-36: rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yis //
T02TD2516E:11a-37: phyag rgya bsdams dang dngos grub dang /
T02TD2516E:11a-38: las rnams yang dag bshad par bya //
T02TD2516E:11a-39: bla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis //
T02TD2516E:11a-40: gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi //
T02TD2516E:11a-41: mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor bsgreng //
T02TD2516E:11a-42: sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje //
T02TD2516E:11a-43: mdzub mo lcags kyu mdzum [?] mo sbyar //
T02TD2516E:11a-44: legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni //
T02TD2516E:11b-0: rdo rje sems dpa' @11b bzhi po yi //
T02TD2516E:11b-1: phyag rgya mang po'i dngos grub 'di //
T02TD2516E:11b-2: mthe bong gzhi bas te mdzub gnyis bcag / rtse sbrang rdo rje rin chen yin //
T02TD2516E:11b-3: de nyid gung mo srin lag dang //
T02TD2516E:11b-4: mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-5: de las srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis //
T02TD2516E:11b-6: mnyam par gzhibs pa rgyal mtshan no//
T02TD2516E:11b-7: de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang //
T02TD2516E:11b-8: kha yi phyogs su gzhag pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-9: mthe bong gnyis ka mnyam par gzhi bas //
T02TD2516E:11b-10: mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang //
T02TD2516E:11b-11: gung mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mo dgug //
T02TD2516E:11b-12: de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-13: de nas srin lag mthe'u chung gzhibs //
T02TD2516E:11b-14: 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin //
T02TD2516E:11b-15: bsdams pa mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba //
T02TD2516E:11b-16: bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-17: mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad bskyed //
T02TD2516E:11b-18: las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad //
T02TD2516E:11b-19: de las mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs la //
T02TD2516E:11b-20: snying gar bkan te bzhag pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-21: mdzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la ;
T02TD2516E:11b-22: / mthe'u chung brkyang ba mche ba'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-23: mthe'u gnyis par mthe bong gnyis //
T02TD2516E:11b-24: mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-25: snying gar mthe bong mnyam la bzhag //
T02TD2516E:11b-26: rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-27: thal mo sbyar rtse kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2516E:11b-28: gar la thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag //
T02TD2516E:11b-29: rdo rje bcings pa thur du blugs //
T02TD2516E:11b-30: thal mo sbyar ba gyin du gtor //
T02TD2516E:11b-31: mthe bong mnyam ste rab tu bsdams //
T02TD2516E:11b-32: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-33: mdzub mo gcig po bkug pa dang //
T02TD2516E:11b-34: mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bor //
T02TD2516E:11b-35: mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcings /
T02TD2516E:11b-36: rdo rje bcing pa mdzub mor bsdams //
T02TD2516E:11b-38: sems dpa' rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyal yang /
T02TD2516E:11b-39: rang gi snying gar yi ge h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bskyed la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:11b-40: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i ljags la /
T02TD2516E:11b-41: chos kyi phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:11b-42: badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yin no //
T02TD2516E:12a-2: pra h'a da ni pha la g'a mi /
T02TD2516E:12a-9: zhes bya ba thams cad ni /
T02TD2516E:12a-10: chos kyi phyag rgya yin te /
T02TD2516E:12a-11: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:12a-12: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02TD2516E:12a-13: rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te /
T02TD2516E:12a-14: mnyam par gzhag pa gnyis su bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-15: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
T02TD2516E:12a-16: de nas bcings pa rab tu bshad //
T02TD2516E:12a-17: g-yon pa rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02TD2516E:12a-18: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-19: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
T02TD2516E:12a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02TD2516E:12a-21: mi g-yo ba yi sa reg pa //
T02TD2516E:12a-22: rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2516E:12a-23: tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog / gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02TD2516E:12a-24: de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD2516E:12a-25: mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-26: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams //
T02TD2516E:12a-27: rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste //
T02TD2516E:12a-28: bsgyings bcas bsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02TD2516E:12a-29: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang //
T02TD2516E:12a-30: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2516E:12a-31: legs so zhes pa snying gar gzhag //
T02TD2516E:12a-32: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis//
T02TD2516E:12a-33: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-34: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02TD2516E:12a-35: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-36: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02TD2516E:12a-37: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri mdung //
T02TD2516E:12a-38: mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2516E:12a-39: rdo rje snying ga kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2516E:12a-40: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yis //
T02TD2516E:12a-41: thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag //
T02TD2516E:12a-42: go cha mthe'u chung phye ba dang //
T02TD2516E:12a-43: khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2516E:12a-44: rdo rje bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02TD2516E:12a-45: bsam pa g-yos pas 'dud par bya //
T02TD2516E:12a-46: phreng ba bcings dang kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2516E:12a-47: rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yis ;
T02TD2516E:12a-48: / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD2516E:12a-49: gdug pa la sogs de bzhin sbyin //
T02TD2516E:12a-50: sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi //
T02TD2516E:12a-51: phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o //
T02TD2516E:12a-52: mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa ni //
T02TD2516E:12a-53: mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che //
T02TD2516E:12a-54: mkhrig ma mdud la mdzub gnyis mdud //
T02TD2516E:12b-0: rgyab @12b gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan //
T02TD2516E:12b-1: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba 'byung ste /
T02TD2516E:12b-2: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub mchog ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-5: lag pa g-yas pa sa la reg pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-7: de nyid kyi lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-9: ting nge 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-11: de nyid las lag pa g-yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-13: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyen pa'i tshul du dkur brten la /
T02TD2516E:12b-14: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje bsor te /
T02TD2516E:12b-15: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-17: rdo rje lcags kyu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa'i tshul du gnas pa ni rdo rje rgyal po'i'o //
T02TD2516E:12b-18: rdo rje mdas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-20: rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pa'i lag pa gnyis legs so zhes pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-22: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing /
T02TD2516E:12b-23: g-yon pa'i dril bu dang bcas pa dkur brten pa ni rdo rje snying po'i'o //
T02TD2516E:12b-24: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-26: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi'o //
T02TD2516E:12b-27: rdo rje 'dzum pas rab tu dga' bar byed pa ni /
T02TD2516E:12b-29: g-yon pa bsnyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing /
T02TD2516E:12b-30: phyag g-yas pas rang gi snying gar padma 'byed pa ni rdo rje can gyi'o //
T02TD2516E:12b-31: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams shing /
T02TD2516E:12b-32: phyag g-yas pas rdo rje ral gri bsnams te /
T02TD2516E:12b-33: 'debs pa'i tshul du 'jog pa ni rdo rje blo'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-1: la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor ba'i tshul du 'jog pa ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-3: rdo rje ljags kyis smra ba'i tshul du mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-5: g-yon pa dkur brten pas sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dril bu bsnams shing phyag g-yas pas sna tshogs rdo rje thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-7: rdo rje go cha 'dzin pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-8: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha rang gi zhal du bzhag pas bsdigs pa'i tshul du mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-10: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir ba ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-12: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul gnyis kyis rdo rje gnyis 'dzin pa rdo rje sgeg mo'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-13: rin po che'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ni phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-14: pi wang brdebs [?] pa ltar byed pa ni pi wang ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-15: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams te gar mdzad pa ni gar mkhan ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-16: phyag na spos snod bsnams pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-17: phyag na me tog gi za ma tog bsnams pa ni me tog ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-18: phyag na mar me'i sdod bu bsnams pa ni mar me ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-19: phyag na dri'i dung phor bsnams pa ni byug pa ma'i'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-20: phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02TD2516E:13a-23: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-24: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:13a-25: phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba thams cad la yang rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-26: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi //
T02TD2516E:13a-27: phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02TD2516E:13a-28: bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni //
T02TD2516E:13a-29: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD2516E:13a-30: dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad la ;
T02TD2516E:13a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la ni sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa la ni /
T02TD2516E:13a-33: su ra ta stvam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13a-34: de'i rjes la yi ge brgya pa lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:13b-0: dbang @13b bskur ba thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:13b-1: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang de bzhin du blangs la /
T02TD2516E:13b-2: badzra satva su sam gra h'a ta /
T02TD2516E:13b-5: badzra karma ka rod bha be /
T02TD2516E:13b-6: zhes bya ba rdo rje glur blangs shing /
T02TD2516E:13b-7: re re zhing rdo rje'i gar byas la /
T02TD2516E:13b-8: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pas mchod pa brgyad kyis las kyi phyag rgyas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2516E:13b-9: lag pa g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu blangs la /
T02TD2516E:13b-10: g-yas pas rdo rje bsor zhing /
T02TD2516E:13b-11: rdo rje'i tshig tu 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13b-12: takki h'um dza:yang rdo rje rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'jog cing /
T02TD2516E:13b-13: takki dza ho zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13b-14: de ltar byas pas ni lus dang dag dang sems rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:13b-15: yi ge h'um gi rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bsams la /
T02TD2516E:13b-16: de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:13b-17: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02TD2516E:13b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD2516E:13b-19: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2516E:13b-20: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02TD2516E:13b-21: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:13b-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug gi dam pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni /
T02TD2516E:13b-23: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD2516E:13b-24: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog //
T02TD2516E:13b-25: srid pa'i mchog ni grub par byed //
T02TD2516E:13b-26: dharm'a aa zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2516E:13b-28: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:13b-29: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung /
T02TD2516E:13b-30: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:13b-31: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD2516E:13b-32: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02TD2516E:13b-33: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02TD2516E:13b-34: ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du //
T02TD2516E:13b-35: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2516E:13b-36: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD2516E:13b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni /
T02TD2516E:14a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02TD2516E:14a-5: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02TD2516E:14a-6: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02TD2516E:14a-7: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02TD2516E:14a-8: de nas dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:14a-9: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD2516E:14a-10: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog //
T02TD2516E:14a-11: sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD2516E:14a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod //
T02TD2516E:14a-13: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD2516E:14a-14: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD2516E:14a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD2516E:14a-16: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2516E:14a-17: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02TD2516E:14a-18: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD2516E:14a-19: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD2516E:14a-20: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD2516E:14a-21: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog //
T02TD2516E:14a-22: gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2516E:14a-23: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD2516E:14a-24: byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD2516E:14a-25: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis //
T02TD2516E:14a-26: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod la /
T02TD2516E:14a-27: rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig //
T02TD2516E:14a-28: de ltar bdag nyid rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:14a-29: phyag rgya chen pos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas la /
T02TD2516E:14a-30: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2516E:14a-31: a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces brjod la de'i don la lhag par mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14a-32: de nas yi ge h'um las byung pa'i rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:14a-33: rgya mtsho chen po'i bar du bsams la /
T02TD2516E:14a-34: de'i dbus su h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las /
T02TD2516E:14a-35: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can zur bzhi pa /
T02TD2516E:14a-36: rin po che thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:14a-37: aom badzra dri dho zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:14a-38: rdo rje bsdams pas snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14a-39: de'i steng du rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas khang pa brtsegs pa /
T02TD2516E:14a-40: rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa sprul la /
T02TD2516E:14a-41: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim aa zhes bya bas seng ge'i gdan /
T02TD2516E:14b-0: @14b mi bskyod pa'i gnas su h'um gam h'um zhes bya bas glang po che'i gdan /
T02TD2516E:14b-1: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tra p'a tra zhes bya bas rta'i gdan /
T02TD2516E:14b-2: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su /
T02TD2516E:14b-3: hr'i: mam hr'i:zhes bya bas rma bya'i gdan /
T02TD2516E:14b-4: don yod par grub pa'i gnas su /
T02TD2516E:14b-5: aa gam aa zhes bya ba las nam mkha' lding gi gdan bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14b-6: seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la yang yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02TD2516E:14b-7: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2516E:14b-8: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du byas pa'i yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis /
T02TD2516E:14b-9: 'og min du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:14b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang chos nyid dran par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14b-12: de nas theg pa chen po nges par 'byung ba'i chos so //
T02TD2516E:14b-13: de'i rjes la theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:14b-14: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-15: 'gro ba thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-16: ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdung ba thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-17: 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-18: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad la btang snyoms su bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-19: chos thams cad la yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-20: sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-21: mig yor dang mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par byas la ;
T02TD2516E:14b-22: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-24: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-25: rigs lnga dang rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02TD2516E:14b-26: phyag rgya dang slob dpon nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:15a-2: sngags kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang /
T02TD2516E:15a-3: theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba dang /
T02TD2516E:15a-4: gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams mngon du byas la /
T02TD2516E:15a-5: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02TD2516E:15a-6: bde ba bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:15a-7: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bsams nas /
T02TD2516E:15a-8: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:15a-9: de nas rim pa 'dis mngon par byang chub pa sngon du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:15a-11: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la //
T02TD2516E:15a-12: de'i steng du rdo rje bsdams pa bkang te bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:15a-13: rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje rnam par bsams nas /
T02TD2516E:15a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to //
T02TD2516E:15a-16: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te /
T02TD2516E:15a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2516E:15a-18: byang chub kyi snying por 'dug pa gang na bder gshegs te /
T02TD2516E:15a-19: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas /
T02TD2516E:15a-21: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par /
T02TD2516E:15a-22: dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya snyam /
T02TD2516E:15a-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas /
T02TD2516E:15a-24: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te /
T02TD2516E:15a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas /
T02TD2516E:15a-27: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2516E:15a-28: ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi /
T02TD2516E:15a-30: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T02TD2516E:15a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02TD2516E:15b-0: rigs @15b kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dga' bar zlos shing 'grub par gyis shig / aom ci tta pra ti bya dham ka ro mi /
T02TD2516E:15b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2516E:15b-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying ga nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
T02TD2516E:15b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2516E:15b-4: rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na ;
T02TD2516E:15b-5: de ni ji lta bu sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te /
T02TD2516E:15b-6: dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur pa bzhin no //
T02TD2516E:15b-7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:15b-8: aom bo dhi tsitto tpa d'a y'a mi zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
T02TD2516E:15b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bkas byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas /
T02TD2516E:15b-11: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo /
T02TD2516E:15b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2516E:15b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis /
T02TD2516E:15b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:15b-16: sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje dbyings su soms shig / aom ti shtha badzra /
T02TD2516E:15b-17: byang chub sdes dpas yang gsol pa /
T02TD2516E:15b-18: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams /
T02TD2516E:15b-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag gis mthong ngo //
T02TD2516E:15b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2516E:15b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2516E:16a-1: thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
T02TD2516E:16a-2: gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi /
T02TD2516E:16a-3: sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so //
T02TD2516E:16a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la /
T02TD2516E:16a-5: rdo rje'i dbyings rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2516E:16a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis /
T02TD2516E:16a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02TD2516E:16a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lags so //
T02TD2516E:16a-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD2516E:16a-10: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di dag ci dgar zlos la soms shig / aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga ta sth'a aa ham /
T02TD2516E:16a-11: de ltar bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs la rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16a-12: sems so sor rtogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:16a-13: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i dus su mi bskyod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:16a-16: don yod par grub pa dang /
T02TD2516E:16a-17: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
T02TD2516E:16a-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis rlobs la /
T02TD2516E:16a-21: mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lus kyi nang du zhugs par gyur pa dang /
T02TD2516E:16a-25: spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16b-0: skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs @16b par sangs rgyas so //
T02TD2516E:16b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so //
T02TD2516E:16b-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin rtog pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba thob bo //
T02TD2516E:16b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid ye shes rtog pa rang bzhin gyis dag go //
T02TD2516E:16b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi la ma mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16b-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis /
T02TD2516E:16b-6: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2516E:16b-7: dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2516E:16b-8: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes ni bskyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la rab tu bzhag nas babs te /
T02TD2516E:16b-9: sngar bskyed pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa /
T02TD2516E:16b-10: rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang /
T02TD2516E:16b-11: rin po che las byas pa'i dbus na /
T02TD2516E:16b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las nges par byung ba'i seng ge'i gdan la /
T02TD2516E:16b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2516E:16b-14: zhal bzhi pa'i tshul du bzhag par gyur par bsam par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:16b-15: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2516E:16b-16: phyogs bzhir re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16b-17: de ltar na 'di ni dang po'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to /
T02TD2516E:16b-19: // / de'i rjes la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas gnas bzhir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2516E:16b-20: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2516E:16b-21: thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' badzra satva zhes bya bas bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:16b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du de byur bas /
T02TD2516E:17a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems @17a * //
T02TD2516E:17a-1: can thams cad bdag med par rtogs par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:17a-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa nyid du gyur nas lhar log ste /
T02TD2516E:17a-3: lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gyur nas gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:17a-4: de nas de rnams las ye shes kyi 'od zer byung nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-5: rang gi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te /
T02TD2516E:17a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-7: nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams tsam gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs chen por gyur nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-8: yang sngar gyi thugs kar gnas pa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje'i tshad tsam nyid du gyur to /
T02TD2516E:17a-9: de las byung nas rang gi phyag gnyis su gnas par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:17a-10: de las kyang yang rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:17a-11: kha dog sna tshogs pa byung ste /
T02TD2516E:17a-12: nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-13: de rnams las yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi sems can gyi khams thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:17a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa la sogs pa la /
T02TD2516E:17a-15: nges par sbyar nas slar yang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas sems dpa'i sku gcig tu gyur nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-16: rang gi thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rjer zhugs te /
T02TD2516E:17a-17: der gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:17a-18: ae ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i //
T02TD2516E:17a-19: kun du bzang po'i sems dpa' brtan //
T02TD2516E:17a-20: de ni brtan phyir lus min yang //
T02TD2516E:17a-21: sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin //
T02TD2516E:17a-22: de nas thugs ka nas byung nas mi bskyod pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste /
T02TD2516E:17a-23: bka' nod cing bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:17a-24: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02TD2516E:17a-25: cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2516E:17a-26: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'i tshul khrims nas /
T02TD2516E:17b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes @17b mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:17b-1: de rdzogs par byed pa'i dang po'i rdo rje dang /
T02TD2516E:17b-2: dang po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu dang bcas par kun du bzang po'i lag tu byin no //
T02TD2516E:17b-3: de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byin no //
T02TD2516E:17b-4: de'i rjes la phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
T02TD2516E:17b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi //
T02TD2516E:17b-6: rdo rje bla na med pa 'di //
T02TD2516E:17b-7: bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin //
T02TD2516E:17b-8: rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas //
T02TD2516E:17b-9: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:17b-14: rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su 'dug ste /
T02TD2516E:17b-15: ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:17b-16: dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs la /
T02TD2516E:17b-17: ched du brjod par blta bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:17b-18: rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te ;
T02TD2516E:17b-19: ae ma'o rdo rje las byung pa'i //
T02TD2516E:17b-20: lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag //
T02TD2516E:17b-21: gang phyir kun du sangs rgyas khyab //
T02TD2516E:17b-22: grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren no //
T02TD2516E:17b-23: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD2516E:17b-24: ye shes bla na med pa 'di //
T02TD2516E:17b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2516E:17b-26: kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o //
T02TD2516E:17b-27: ae ma'o bdag ni rang bzhin bdag //
T02TD2516E:17b-28: rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na //
T02TD2516E:17b-29: 'dod chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:17b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyis //
T02TD2516E:17b-32: ye shes 'di ni dri ma med //
T02TD2516E:17b-33: 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom ;
T02TD2516E:17b-34: / bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed //
T02TD2516E:17b-35: ae ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyis //
T02TD2516E:17b-36: legs byin nang na bdag mchog pas //
T02TD2516E:17b-37: rnam rtog bral ba de dag gis //
T02TD2516E:17b-38: nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin //
T02TD2516E:17b-39: sangs rgyas kun gyis legs byin pa'i //
T02TD2516E:17b-41: rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed //
T02TD2516E:17b-42: lha rdzas dgyes pa sprel pa'o //
T02TD2516E:17b-43: ae ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang //
T02TD2516E:17b-44: khams gsum dbang pos dgongs pas na //
T02TD2516E:17b-45: rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi //
T02TD2516E:17b-46: dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no //
T02TD2516E:18a-2: dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te //
T02TD2516E:18a-3: bdag gi lag tu byin pas na //
T02TD2516E:18a-4: rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag / ae ma'o sems can khams kun du //
T02TD2516E:18a-5: snang byed gzi brjid dpe med bdag //
T02TD2516E:18a-6: gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi //
T02TD2516E:18a-7: 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyong bar byed //
T02TD2516E:18a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di //
T02TD2516E:18a-9: mi shes mun nag 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2516E:18a-10: shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i //
T02TD2516E:18a-11: nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag / ae ma'o don kun grub pa dang //
T02TD2516E:18a-12: dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD2516E:18a-13: don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i //
T02TD2516E:18a-14: dri med par ni bdag yin no //
T02TD2516E:18a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun //
T02TD2516E:18a-16: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi //
T02TD2516E:18a-17: yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di //
T02TD2516E:18a-18: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02TD2516E:18a-19: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyis //
T02TD2516E:18a-20: sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir //
T02TD2516E:18a-21: ae ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi //
T02TD2516E:18a-22: bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin //
T02TD2516E:18a-23: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02TD2516E:18a-24: rmad byung bskyed pa ston pa po //
T02TD2516E:18a-25: dgyes chen bskyed pa'i ye shes te //
T02TD2516E:18a-26: gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus //
T02TD2516E:18a-27: ae ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag //
T02TD2516E:18a-28: dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te //
T02TD2516E:18a-29: gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams la //
T02TD2516E:18a-30: rnam par dag par dmigs par gyur //
T02TD2516E:18a-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi //
T02TD2516E:18a-32: de yi kho na rtog pa 'di //
T02TD2516E:18a-33: bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin //
T02TD2516E:18a-34: chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur ;
T02TD2516E:18a-35: / ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18a-36: 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs //
T02TD2516E:18a-37: gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang //
T02TD2516E:18a-38: dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin //
T02TD2516E:18a-39: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18a-40: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02TD2516E:18a-41: dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing //
T02TD2516E:18a-42: sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog //
T02TD2516E:18a-43: rdo rje dam pa chos can gyis //
T02TD2516E:18a-44: ae ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag / gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang //
T02TD2516E:18a-46: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-0: @18b chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong //
T02TD2516E:18b-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang //
T02TD2516E:18b-2: byang chub snying po yin par dgongs //
T02TD2516E:18b-3: ae ma'o rang byung rnams kyis gsang //
T02TD2516E:18b-4: ldem po dag tu bdag dgongs te //
T02TD2516E:18b-5: gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa //
T02TD2516E:18b-6: tshig gi spros las rnam par bral /
T02TD2516E:18b-7: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-8: rdo rje bzlas par brjod pa yin //
T02TD2516E:18b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-11: ae ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyis nges //
T02TD2516E:18b-12: phrin las mang po kun bdag yin //
T02TD2516E:18b-13: sangs rgyas don kun lhun grub phyir //
T02TD2516E:18b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-16: las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog / bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin //
T02TD2516E:18b-17: las rnams kun ni byed du bcug //
T02TD2516E:18b-18: ae ma'o brtson 'grus go cha ni //
T02TD2516E:18b-19: brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag //
T02TD2516E:18b-20: de ni brtan phyir lus min yang //
T02TD2516E:18b-21: rdo rje'i lus su byed pa'i mchog /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-22: byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste //
T02TD2516E:18b-23: brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che //
T02TD2516E:18b-24: grogs po chen por brjod pa yin //
T02TD2516E:18b-25: ae ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2516E:18b-26: thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te //
T02TD2516E:18b-27: zhi yang sems can don du ni //
T02TD2516E:18b-28: ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:18b-29: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-30: ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog //
T02TD2516E:18b-31: kun gyi mchog ni 'dul byed pa //
T02TD2516E:18b-32: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rno ste //
T02TD2516E:18b-33: thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD2516E:18b-34: ae ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i //
T02TD2516E:18b-35: dam tshig bdag ste bstan pa dag //
T02TD2516E:18b-36: bsam pa thams cad rab 'grub phyir //
T02TD2516E:18b-37: grol ba rnams kyang bcing bar byed //
T02TD2516E:18b-38: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:18b-39: phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan //
T02TD2516E:18b-40: sangs rgyas kun du myur 'grub phyir //
T02TD2516E:18b-41: dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' //
T02TD2516E:18b-42: de nas mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal gyis rdo rje sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:18b-43: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi nga rgyal gyis rin chen sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:18b-44: 'od dpag tu med pa'i nga rgyal gyis chos kyi sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:19a-0: don yod par grub pa'i nga rgyal gyis @19a * //
T02TD2516E:19a-1: las kyi sems ma bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:19a-2: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni //
T02TD2516E:19a-4: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19a-5: sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag //
T02TD2516E:19a-6: gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang //
T02TD2516E:19a-7: rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin //
T02TD2516E:19a-8: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19a-9: rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid grags //
T02TD2516E:19a-10: gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19a-11: dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin //
T02TD2516E:19a-12: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19a-13: chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdag //
T02TD2516E:19a-14: gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
T02TD2516E:19a-15: 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med//
T02TD2516E:19a-16: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19a-17: las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag //
T02TD2516E:19a-18: gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams //
T02TD2516E:19a-19: ma lus par ni las zad byed //
T02TD2516E:19a-20: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02TD2516E:19a-21: sgeg mo la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02TD2516E:19a-22: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:19a-23: ae ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni //
T02TD2516E:19a-24: mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de //
T02TD2516E:19a-25: gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas //
T02TD2516E:19a-26: mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:19a-27: ae ma'o rin chen mchod pa bzhes //
T02TD2516E:19a-28: bdag dang 'dra ba grags pa med //
T02TD2516E:19a-29: gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang ;
T02TD2516E:19a-30: / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:19a-31: ae ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i //
T02TD2516E:19a-32: glu mchog tshul gyi mchod pa yin //
T02TD2516E:19a-33: gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yi //
T02TD2516E:19a-34: mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed //
T02TD2516E:19a-35: ae ma'o mchog kun don mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2516E:19a-36: mchod pa rgya cher bdag yin te /
T02TD2516E:19a-37: gang phyir rdo rje gar cho gas //
T02TD2516E:19a-38: sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed //
T02TD2516E:19a-39: yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i nga rgyas kyis /
T02TD2516E:19a-40: rdo rje bdug pa mo la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02TD2516E:19a-41: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:19a-42: ae ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che //
T02TD2516E:19a-43: rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin //
T02TD2516E:19a-44: gang phyir sems can dbang ldan pas //
T02TD2516E:19a-45: myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:19a-46: ae ma'o me tog mchod pa'i bdag //
T02TD2516E:19a-47: thams cad kyis ni rgyan byed de //
T02TD2516E:19a-48: gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2516E:19a-49: rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub //
T02TD2516E:19a-50: ae ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni //
T02TD2516E:19b-0: rgya chen dge @19b ba bdag yin te //
T02TD2516E:19b-1: gang phyir gnas bcas myur du ni //
T02TD2516E:19b-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang thob //
T02TD2516E:19b-3: ae ma'o dri yi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-4: mchod pa'i lha rdzas yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2516E:19b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri //
T02TD2516E:19b-7: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis /
T02TD2516E:19b-8: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi bskyed de /
T02TD2516E:19b-9: 'di rnams kyi ched du brjod pa ni /
T02TD2516E:19b-10: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-11: yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa'i bdag / gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas //
T02TD2516E:19b-13: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-14: rdo rje zhags pa dam po'i bdag / rdul phran zhugs pa thams cad kyang //
T02TD2516E:19b-15: bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya //
T02TD2516E:19b-16: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-17: rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po'i bdag / bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams //
T02TD2516E:19b-18: sems can don kun bcing bar 'dod //
T02TD2516E:19b-19: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-20: rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag / kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas kyang //
T02TD2516E:19b-21: bran du yang ni gyur pa yin //
T02TD2516E:19b-23: 'di tsan gyis dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin brtan pa yin no /
T02TD2516E:19b-26: // / de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad dang tha mi dad par bsams la bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:19b-27: de nas bsdu bas byin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad /
T02TD2516E:19b-28: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da bandha nam ka ro mi zhes brjod cing /
T02TD2516E:19b-29: ae ma'o kun du bzang pho yi ;
T02TD2516E:19b-30: / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi //
T02TD2516E:19b-31: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes //
T02TD2516E:19b-32: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:19b-33: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs te slar byung nas /
T02TD2516E:19b-34: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa dang gcig tu gyur te /
T02TD2516E:19b-35: yang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa mdzad de /
T02TD2516E:19b-36: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-37: rgya chen gdong nas skye ba med //
T02TD2516E:19b-38: rdul phran thams cad ji snyed kyi //
T02TD2516E:19b-39: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02TD2516E:20a-0: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i @20a * //
T02TD2516E:20a-1: gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD2516E:20a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa blangs nas /
T02TD2516E:20a-3: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-7: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas /
T02TD2516E:20a-8: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-9: rigs thams cad la rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-12: rjes su mnyes par bya ba dang ;
T02TD2516E:20a-15: 'od kyis snang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-17: 'dzum pa rmad du byung ba la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-18: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-19: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gcod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-21: spros pa med pa'i chos la nges par sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-22: mchod pa ma lus shing lus pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-23: theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-24: sems can nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnams las bsrung ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-25: srung ba thams cad las yongs su bskyab pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-26: sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig tu byas pa nyid kyi bcing ba nyid kyi khu tshur dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-35: thabs rdzogs par bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-36: rdo rje lcags kyus sems can thams cad thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i spyod pa la gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-38: theg pa gzhan 'dod pa la sems dran ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-39: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing skye ba med par dbab pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20a-40: dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer bskyang ba nyid la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:20a-41: 'di ni las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yin no /
T02TD2516E:20b-0: // / de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin @20b yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus /
T02TD2516E:20b-1: mchod pa'i yan lag rnams bsangs la /
T02TD2516E:20b-2: rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:20b-3: badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-4: me tog gi phyag rgyas me tog / badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-6: badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-7: bdug pa'i phyag rgyas bdug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-8: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02TD2516E:20b-9: a'adya nutpa nna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-10: ral gri'i phyag rgyas ni bshos te /
T02TD2516E:20b-11: rdo rje bsdams pa las ral gris 'debs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:20b-12: badzra a'a lo ke zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-13: mar me'i phyag rgya ni mar me'o ;
T02TD2516E:20b-14: / aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-19: me tog dkar po dri zhim pa dang /
T02TD2516E:20b-20: tsandan dkar po'i chu dung la sogs pa'i snod du blugs la /
T02TD2516E:20b-21: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis mchod yon gyi phyag rgya dang lan gsum mam bdun nam /
T02TD2516E:20b-22: nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:20b-23: de nas ji lta ba bzhin du sgo dbye ba byas la /
T02TD2516E:20b-24: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2516E:20b-25: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:20b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bdag nyid /
T02TD2516E:20b-27: lag ngar gnyis ni rdo rje btsir //
T02TD2516E:20b-28: rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis //
T02TD2516E:20b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02TD2516E:20b-30: g-yon pa'i se gol brdabs pa dang //
T02TD2516E:20b-31: g-yas pa yis ni grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:20b-32: g-yas pa thal mo zhes bya ste //
T02TD2516E:20b-33: 'dus pa yang ni gnyi ga yin //
T02TD2516E:20b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2516E:20b-36: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po'o //
T02TD2516E:20b-37: 'di ni bka' tsam gyis bsgrags pas /
T02TD2516E:20b-39: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur na //
T02TD2516E:20b-40: gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02TD2516E:20b-41: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi ;
T02TD2516E:20b-42: / phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2516E:20b-43: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2516E:20b-44: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:20b-45: de nas sgo rnams thams cad du //
T02TD2516E:20b-46: lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas //
T02TD2516E:20b-47: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02TD2516E:20b-48: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:21a-1: tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2516E:21a-2: sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02TD2516E:21a-3: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02TD2516E:21a-4: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes byar brjod /
T02TD2516E:21a-6: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2516E:21a-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo yang bcad de /
T02TD2516E:21a-9: rdo rje sems dpas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2516E:21a-10: rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2516E:21a-11: badzra dh'a tu dri shya zhes bya ba la sogs pas thams cad blta bar byas la /
T02TD2516E:21a-12: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho aa ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:21a-13: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:21a-14: sngags lan gsum brjod la chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang /
T02TD2516E:21a-15: de rnams la rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2516E:21a-16: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pas dbang bskur la /
T02TD2516E:21a-17: mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:21a-18: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:21a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang dris so //
T02TD2516E:21a-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang bdug pas so //
T02TD2516E:21a-22: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya nu tpanna tv'a ta ces bya ba dang bshos kyis so //
T02TD2516E:21a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta d'i pa p'u dza me gha se mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba dang mar mes mchod pa bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:21a-24: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2516E:21a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'atma nam ni r+ya ta na p'u dza spha ra na karma badzri h'um aa: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sarba a'atma nam ni r+y'a ta na p'u dza sphar na karma gri dza: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sarba a'atma nam ni r+y'a ta na aa nu r'a ga na p'u ja spha ra na karma b'a ne h'um ho: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'atma nam ni r+y'a ta na s'a dhu ka ra p'u dza spha ra na karma tushti aa: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya aam bhishe ke ratne bhyo badzra ma ni aom /
T02TD2516E:21a-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta s'u r+ye bhyo badzra te dza ni dzv'a la hr'i: aom nam: sarba ta th'a th'a ga ta a'a sha pa ri p'u ra na tsihna ma ni dhva dz'a gre bhyo badzra dhva dza gre tr'am /
T02TD2516E:21b-0: aom nam: sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a pr'i ti pra mo dya k'a re bhyo badzra h'a sya h'a: aom @21b sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu ga ta badzra dharma ta sa m'a ti bhi stu no mi ma h'a dharma gri hr'i: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a nir ha ree tu no mi ma h'a gho sha nu ge dham /
T02TD2516E:21b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsakra aaksha pa ri b'a ra ta di sarba s'u tr'an tra na yee stu no mi sarba mandale h'um /
T02TD2516E:21b-2: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sandha bh'a sha buddha sam g'i ti pi rge yam stu no mi badzra b'a rtse b'am /
T02TD2516E:21b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa spha ra na p'u dza karme ka ra ka ra /
T02TD2516E:21b-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu shpa pra sar spha ra na p'u dza karme ki ri ki ri /
T02TD2516E:21b-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ka dzva la spha ra na p'u dza ka rme ka ra ka ra /
T02TD2516E:21b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha sa mu dra spha ra na p'u dza karme ku ru ku ru zhes bya bas sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rig ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:21b-7: de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te /
T02TD2516E:21b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa dkur bzhag ste //
T02TD2516E:21b-9: btsir ba gnyis su byas pa yis //
T02TD2516E:21b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni //
T02TD2516E:21b-11: bsgyings bcas bsor ba gnyis ka yis //
T02TD2516E:21b-12: lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:21b-13: mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul dang ni //
T02TD2516E:21b-14: legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis //
T02TD2516E:21b-15: snying gar nyi ma bstan par bya //
T02TD2516E:21b-16: g-yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs //
T02TD2516E:21b-17: de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya //
T02TD2516E:21b-18: g-yas pa yis ni g-yon par dbye //
T02TD2516E:21b-19: snying gar g-yon pa ral gri 'dud //
T02TD2516E:21b-20: mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02TD2516E:21b-21: rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung //
T02TD2516E:21b-22: rdo rje gar bskor bkrol ba yi //
T02TD2516E:21b-23: thal mo 'grom [?] pa spyi bor gzhag / go cha mthe'u chung phye ba dang ;
T02TD2516E:21b-24: / khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o //
T02TD2516E:21b-25: de nas phyag bzhi byas la /
T02TD2516E:21b-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas te /
T02TD2516E:21b-27: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:21b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD2516E:21b-29: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shurdho& ham zhes bya bas rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la /
T02TD2516E:21b-30: aom sarba sa ma yo& ham zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22a-0: de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge @22a * //
T02TD2516E:22a-1: brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid kyis bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:22a-2: thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la /
T02TD2516E:22a-3: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing /
T02TD2516E:22a-4: bzlas pa la brtson par byas na de lta bus ni thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:22a-5: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la skyo bar gyur na yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la /
T02TD2516E:22a-6: mchod yon phul te mchod la phyag bzhi byas nas /
T02TD2516E:22a-7: phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid las bkrol la /
T02TD2516E:22a-8: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas badzra mu: zhes bya ba dang ;
T02TD2516E:22a-10: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni bshad zin to //
T02TD2516E:22a-11: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni /
T02TD2516E:22a-15: rdo rje las kyi gnas nyid yin no //
T02TD2516E:22a-16: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no //
T02TD2516E:22a-17: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying gnas byung ba /
T02TD2516E:22a-18: rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:22a-19: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22a-20: de'i rjes las sarba mu tram mee tri ku ru bar ka pa tse na bam zhes bya ba dang ;
T02TD2516E:22a-21: mdzub mo gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha bgos la /
T02TD2516E:22a-22: tha mar mnyam pa'i thal mos snga ma bzhin du mnyes par byas la /
T02TD2516E:22a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas /
T02TD2516E:22a-24: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir /
T02TD2516E:22a-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste /
T02TD2516E:22a-26: bdag gi chog ma tshang ba gang dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab la /
T02TD2516E:22a-28: aom kri to ba sarba satv'a rtha siddhe ma dattva ya th'a nu ga gatstsha tv'am buddh'a bi sha yam /
T02TD2516E:22a-29: pu na ra ga man yatstsha zhes bya bas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:22a-30: aom badzra satva mu: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis /
T02TD2516E:22a-31: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22a-32: de ltar na thams cad kyang gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:22a-33: ji lta ba bzhin du sbrul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams ni /
T02TD2516E:22b-0: de @22b bzhin du yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug la /
T02TD2516E:22b-4: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas langs te /
T02TD2516E:22b-6: glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22b-7: de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam /
