T02TD2516E:22b-10: dus ji srid kyi lha rnams las gnang ba thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22b-11: yang na snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02TD2516E:22b-12: mchod pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02TD2516E:22b-13: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2516E:22b-14: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2516E:22b-15: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2516E:22b-16: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2516E:22b-17: de nas badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:22b-18: de'i don gsum po rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02TD2516E:22b-19: phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sngags lnga pos rang gi snying gar /
T02TD2516E:22b-20: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2516E:22b-21: sngar bshad pa'i snying pos dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de /
T02TD2516E:22b-22: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la /
T02TD2516E:22b-23: badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de rnams dang gcig tu gyur par byas la /
T02TD2516E:22b-24: badzra dh'a tu ra ham sva yam zhes bya bas /
T02TD2516E:22b-25: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bdag nyid nges par byas te /
T02TD2516E:22b-26: thams cad kyang bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bsgoms la /
T02TD2516E:22b-27: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'am /
T02TD2516E:22b-28: sngags zlos shing lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar yang bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:22b-29: phyogs de lta bu la sogs pas kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:22b-30: ngal zhing dub na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:22b-33: thun bzhi'i tha mar yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa byas la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-0: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang @23a * //
T02TD2516E:23a-2: rnal 'byor chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pas /
T02TD2516E:23a-3: dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi nus pa gang yin pa nges ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02TD2516E:23a-4: thams cad kyi sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum byas la /
T02TD2516E:23a-5: badzro tishtha zhes lan 'bum bzlas la rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02TD2516E:23a-6: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:23a-7: de nas brtsams te des bum pa la sogs pa de nam mkha' la 'jog par nus par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:23a-8: rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par //
T02TD2516E:23a-9: rab mnyam gzhag pas bsnyams nas ni //
T02TD2516E:23a-10: shi ba thams cad slong ba ste //
T02TD2516E:23a-11: rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-12: badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas la /
T02TD2516E:23a-13: rdo rje dril bu mar la byugs te /
T02TD2516E:23a-14: sreg blugs stong gis mngon par sbyangs la /
T02TD2516E:23a-15: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bzung la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de 'grub par 'gyur la lag na thogs pa thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:23a-16: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2516E:23a-18: // / de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02TD2516E:23a-23: byang gi phyogs kyi char ram /
T02TD2516E:23a-24: rang yid dang mthun pa der dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-25: der shin tu mnyam zhing snum la shar du gzhol ba /
T02TD2516E:23a-26: tshad dang ldan zhing tsha sgo can ma yin pa'i sa'i char rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o ;
T02TD2516E:23a-27: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru lnga bcu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-28: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni khru nyi shu'am de'i phyed do //
T02TD2516E:23a-29: sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sam drug pa bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-30: de la dang po kho nar mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su /
T02TD2516E:23a-31: mi rus kyi phye ma khrag dang dug dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:23a-32: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la /
T02TD2516E:23a-33: bdag dang slob ma dang sa bdag la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23a-34: de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:23b-0: 'dom gang tsam la lkog ma'am lte ba'am @23b pus mo nub pa tsam du 'og tu brkos la /
T02TD2516E:23b-1: spos chu dri zhim pos sbrus pa'i sas bkang la /
T02TD2516E:23b-2: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i sbos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02TD2516E:23b-3: 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-4: khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-5: rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-6: sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD2516E:23b-7: tha mar dril bu legs par btags pa dang bcas pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02TD2516E:23b-8: bla re'i mchod pha sna tshogs bres pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-9: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-10: grva bzhir sbos snod gzhag pa /
T02TD2516E:23b-11: me tog dang mar me dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la dris byugs te /
T02TD2516E:23b-12: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i sbos chus yongs su bsangs la /
T02TD2516E:23b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-14: sa sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2516E:23b-16: // / de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing lus dris byugs la /
T02TD2516E:23b-17: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing /
T02TD2516E:23b-18: shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgos la //
T02TD2516E:23b-19: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing gdong dri zhim par byas la /
T02TD2516E:23b-20: yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:23b-22: tshes bcu gsum mam bcu bzhi nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:23b-23: bco lnga'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-24: gnyug mar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang /
T02TD2516E:23b-26: de bzhin du lag pas reg par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:23b-27: rdo rje sems dpa' bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-28: de nas cho ga thams cad sbyang par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-29: yang na tshes bco lnga'i snga dro nas brtsams te bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-31: slob dpon slob ma dang bcas pas smyung bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-32: de la re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:23b-34: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2516E:23b-35: de nas rdo rje'i 'khor los dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02TD2516E:23b-36: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa bzung la /
T02TD2516E:24a-0: rnal 'byor chen po dang khang pa brtsegs @24a * //
T02TD2516E:24a-2: gad na la sogs pa bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:24a-3: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
T02TD2516E:24a-4: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24a-5: deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02TD2516E:24a-6: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD2516E:24a-7: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par ;
T02TD2516E:24a-8: / gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02TD2516E:24a-9: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02TD2516E:24a-10: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te /
T02TD2516E:24a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02TD2516E:24a-12: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02TD2516E:24a-13: deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02TD2516E:24a-14: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02TD2516E:24a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02TD2516E:24a-16: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02TD2516E:24a-17: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas te /
T02TD2516E:24a-18: spos snod lag tu thogs te /
T02TD2516E:24a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24a-20: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2516E:24a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2516E:24a-22: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2516E:24a-23: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2516E:24a-24: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02TD2516E:24a-25: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02TD2516E:24a-28: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i mchog rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02TD2516E:24a-29: yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2516E:24a-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas /
T02TD2516E:24a-31: de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa la /
T02TD2516E:24a-32: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:24a-33: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24a-34: de nas langs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la /
T02TD2516E:24a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang par mngon sum du bsams la /
T02TD2516E:24a-36: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02TD2516E:24a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02TD2516E:24a-38: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02TD2516E:24a-39: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02TD2516E:24a-40: bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal //
T02TD2516E:24a-41: phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag yin //
T02TD2516E:24a-42: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag /
T02TD2516E:24b-0: @24b byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02TD2516E:24b-1: de nas badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02TD2516E:24b-2: yi ge aa las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:24b-3: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2516E:24b-4: badzra satva auttishth'a zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du bteg go//
T02TD2516E:24b-5: de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2516E:24b-6: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2516E:24b-7: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02TD2516E:24b-8: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02TD2516E:24b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas //
T02TD2516E:24b-10: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02TD2516E:24b-11: rdo rje'i lta bas phyogs dang mtshams dang /
T02TD2516E:24b-13: rab dang dra ba byas nas /
T02TD2516E:24b-14: rkang mthil nas yongs su gzung ste /
T02TD2516E:24b-15: sa gzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du /
T02TD2516E:24b-16: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la //
T02TD2516E:24b-17: yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2516E:24b-18: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas /
T02TD2516E:24b-19: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24b-20: aom badzra sarba mandala h'um dza: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang /
T02TD2516E:24b-21: mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni //
T02TD2516E:24b-22: dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa yin no //
T02TD2516E:24b-23: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2516E:24b-24: ma h'a badzra tsakra aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24b-25: rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2516E:24b-26: de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i phur bu /
T02TD2516E:24b-27: dbus dang grva bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:24b-28: aom badzra ki la ya sarba bighnam bandha h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:24b-29: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
T02TD2516E:24b-30: rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la /
T02TD2516E:24b-31: h'um zlos shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhi dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:24b-32: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje rtsa gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:24b-33: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'an phat /
T02TD2516E:24b-34: ki la ya ki la ya sarba p'a pam phat: badzra ki la ya /
T02TD2516E:24b-35: badzra dha rdo a'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:24b-36: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:25a-0: @25a * // rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgyas bsrung ba thams cad brtan par byas la /
T02TD2516E:25a-1: rdo rje go chas go bskon par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:25a-2: de yang bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor pa la //
T02TD2516E:25a-3: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtan //
T02TD2516E:25a-4: rdo rje go chas go bskon pas //
T02TD2516E:25a-5: dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2516E:25a-7: yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:25a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2516E:25a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas su tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par byas la /
T02TD2516E:25a-11: lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25a-12: de nas nam mkha'i phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:25a-14: bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste /
T02TD2516E:25a-15: mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do //
T02TD2516E:25a-16: de nas dbang bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad cig blugs la /
T02TD2516E:25a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2516E:25a-18: spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug la spos kyis bdugs te /
T02TD2516E:25a-19: chog bzhin du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25a-20: nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzlas par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:25a-23: 'og nas bshad pa'i de'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la /
T02TD2516E:25a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25a-25: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02TD2516E:25a-27: sangs rgyas spyan la re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg blugs dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25a-28: lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02TD2516E:25a-30: // / de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02TD2516E:25a-32: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2516E:25a-33: me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod la /
T02TD2516E:25a-34: phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25a-35: de la re zhig dang por khrus legs par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:25b-0: @25b lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02TD2516E:25b-2: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD2516E:25b-3: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2516E:25b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2516E:25b-5: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2516E:25b-6: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2516E:25b-7: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:25b-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2516E:25b-9: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:25b-10: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2516E:25b-12: de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02TD2516E:25b-13: rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2516E:25b-14: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon //
T02TD2516E:25b-15: brjod ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02TD2516E:25b-16: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2516E:25b-17: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02TD2516E:25b-18: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD2516E:25b-19: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02TD2516E:25b-20: spyan sngar ma lus da ltar so sor bshags //
T02TD2516E:25b-21: bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang //
T02TD2516E:25b-22: rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don //
T02TD2516E:25b-23: sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la yang /
T02TD2516E:25b-24: rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02TD2516E:25b-25: thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02TD2516E:25b-26: blo gros sdig bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom //
T02TD2516E:25b-27: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang zhugs pa //
T02TD2516E:25b-28: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2516E:25b-29: blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' rab ste //
T02TD2516E:25b-30: dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyal byed tshal //
T02TD2516E:25b-31: srid pa'i 'byor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog / gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2516E:25b-32: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing //
T02TD2516E:25b-33: blo gros rnams rgyal thugs rje cher ldan pa'i //
T02TD2516E:25b-34: brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing //
T02TD2516E:25b-35: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2516E:25b-36: rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02TD2516E:25b-37: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rgyal gyur pa //
T02TD2516E:25b-38: snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs //
T02TD2516E:25b-39: mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:26a-1: rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am //
T02TD2516E:26a-2: yang na yongs su bskyab par bya phyir ram //
T02TD2516E:26a-3: rang gi sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:26a-4: 'di dag thams cad rtsva sogs bzhin du btang //
T02TD2516E:26a-5: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02TD2516E:26a-6: bsam gtan shes rab bla na med pa ni //
T02TD2516E:26a-7: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:26a-8: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:26a-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2516E:26a-10: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni //
T02TD2516E:26a-11: 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:26a-12: khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:26a-14: bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02TD2516E:26a-15: bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-16: bdag gis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o ;
T02TD2516E:26a-17: / bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:26a-18: thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyis btul nas /
T02TD2516E:26a-19: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la rab tu gzhag par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-20: bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang /
T02TD2516E:26a-21: sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do zhes sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-22: bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-23: bdag gis ma yengs pa'i sems dang /
T02TD2516E:26a-24: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-25: bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-26: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas par so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26a-27: bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:26a-28: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T02TD2516E:26a-29: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-0: de bzhin du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i @26b bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrub par bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-1: 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed par rdo rje lta bu yin te /
T02TD2516E:26b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang /
T02TD2516E:26b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:26b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste 'di nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-5: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par byas pa'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun du bzang po'i spyod pa zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:26b-6: gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:26b-7: yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:26b-8: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-9: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:26b-10: de'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:26b-11: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam aa ho //
T02TD2516E:26b-12: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying po yang snying gar bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:26b-13: spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste /
T02TD2516E:26b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing /
T02TD2516E:26b-16: dpral bar yi ge tram las rin po che /
T02TD2516E:26b-17: lkog mar yi ge hram las padma /
T02TD2516E:26b-18: spyi bor kam las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2516E:26b-22: rang gi snying ga la sogs pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-23: de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:26b-24: me tog gis me tog go //
T02TD2516E:26b-25: bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo //
T02TD2516E:26b-26: mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-27: de nas au dumw'a ra dang aa shvadtha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa /
T02TD2516E:26b-28: rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-29: des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:26b-30: de nas ku sha sar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang /
T02TD2516E:26b-31: rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas /
T02TD2516E:27a-1: 'dis ni sngags su gyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o //
T02TD2516E:27a-2: de nas dpung pa g-yon par ni //
T02TD2516E:27a-3: rdo rje srung ba bzlas pa yi //
T02TD2516E:27a-4: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i //
T02TD2516E:27a-5: bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing //
T02TD2516E:27a-6: de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas /
T02TD2516E:27a-7: thams cad la gzengs bstod pa byas nas /
T02TD2516E:27a-8: bzhin bzangs dag longs shig / nang par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD2516E:27a-10: // / de nas nyi ma shar kar dkyil 'khor de de bzhin du steng du nam mkha' la bzhag la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27a-11: de la dang por re zhig chon rtsi sngon po dang /
T02TD2516E:27a-15: dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor bsgyur la /
T02TD2516E:27a-16: go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas /
T02TD2516E:27a-17: de la h'um dr'am hr'i: aa aom zhes bya bas rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
T02TD2516E:27a-18: d'i pta drishti aam ku sha dza: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la //
T02TD2516E:27a-19: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig //
T02TD2516E:27a-20: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02TD2516E:27a-21: zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas /
T02TD2516E:27a-22: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing /
T02TD2516E:27a-23: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:27a-24: rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig / ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27a-25: de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btab pa'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste /
T02TD2516E:27a-26: rang gi lag na gnas pa la //
T02TD2516E:27a-27: srad bu des gang bar byas la /
T02TD2516E:27a-28: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: spa ra spa ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a: aa tyan ta /
T02TD2516E:27a-30: sarba dharm'a: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shir bsgril bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27a-31: bsgril nas mig g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:27a-32: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas la /
T02TD2516E:27a-33: srad bu de dris byugs ba'i gser la sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:27a-34: dri dang me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la /
T02TD2516E:27b-0: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a @27b ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste /
T02TD2516E:27b-1: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27b-2: de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris /
T02TD2516E:27b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi yang byugs la /
T02TD2516E:27b-4: phyi rol kun du me tog gis mdzes par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:27b-5: bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod yon phul te /
T02TD2516E:27b-6: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:27b-7: sgeg mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la /
T02TD2516E:27b-9: mig g-yas dang g-yon du yi ge dza ser po bkod la /
T02TD2516E:27b-10: nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de /
T02TD2516E:27b-11: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27b-12: de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa /
T02TD2516E:27b-13: yid kyis badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas la rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par byas nas /
T02TD2516E:27b-14: sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badzra karma zhes brjod de rang gi snying gnas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27b-15: de nas badzra satva zhes brjod de /
T02TD2516E:27b-16: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la srad bu de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02TD2516E:27b-17: dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu de btang la /
T02TD2516E:27b-18: phyogs thams cad du mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing /
T02TD2516E:27b-20: rdo rje srad bus gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27b-21: yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la byang du bltas te /
T02TD2516E:27b-23: de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa la /
T02TD2516E:27b-24: byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar du thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:27b-25: rlung gi phyogs su gnas te /
T02TD2516E:27b-26: lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:27b-27: de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:27b-28: yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o ;
T02TD2516E:27b-29: / kha khyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:27b-30: yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kyi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang /
T02TD2516E:27b-31: yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi bar du thig gdab par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:28a-1: grogs mchog bskor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-2: de la re zhig srad bu'i sngags ni /
T02TD2516E:28a-3: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:28a-4: dza dza dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-5: de la sgo ni cha brgyad pa'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-6: sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do //
T02TD2516E:28a-7: kha khyer phyi'i thams cad dang nang gi kun ni sgo'i phyed do //
T02TD2516E:28a-8: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-9: rta babs ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-10: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD2516E:28a-11: ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la /
T02TD2516E:28a-12: seng ldeng gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu la /
T02TD2516E:28a-13: steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la /
T02TD2516E:28a-14: rdo rje bur bu'i sngags bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:28a-15: rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la /
T02TD2516E:28a-16: de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ;
T02TD2516E:28a-17: phyi'i rdo rje'i phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g-yas nas bskor ba'i rim gyis gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la /
T02TD2516E:28a-19: mtha' skor khru drug par bya ba ni tshad chung ngu yin te /
T02TD2516E:28a-20: gzhan dag tu ni ji tsam 'tsham par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28a-21: da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:28a-22: sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang //
T02TD2516E:28a-23: tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi //
T02TD2516E:28a-24: thig gis mkhas pa ci nus kyis //
T02TD2516E:28a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:28a-26: gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
T02TD2516E:28a-27: rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la //
T02TD2516E:28a-28: thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa //
T02TD2516E:28a-29: dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2516E:28a-30: grva yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02TD2516E:28a-31: sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su //
T02TD2516E:28a-32: rdo rje rin chen spras par ni //
T02TD2516E:28a-33: dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:28a-34: de li rim pa'i nang zhugs la //
T02TD2516E:28a-36: thig gis yongs su bskor bya zhing ;
T02TD2516E:28a-37: / ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis par //
T02TD2516E:28a-38: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la //
T02TD2516E:28a-39: shes rab can gyis thig gdab po //
T02TD2516E:28a-40: shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor //
T02TD2516E:28a-41: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02TD2516E:28a-42: nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang /
T02TD2516E:28a-43: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang /
T02TD2516E:28b-0: @28b rnga yab dang zla ba dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dang /
T02TD2516E:28b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi grva'i mtshams thams cad du /
T02TD2516E:28b-2: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang /
T02TD2516E:28b-3: de'i sgo rnams kyi ni khyud kyi mtshams rnams su /
T02TD2516E:28b-4: zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28b-5: gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog par 'dod na /
T02TD2516E:28b-6: phur bu'i sngags len 'bum bzlas pa'i phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par brtan pa dang /
T02TD2516E:28b-7: dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28b-8: de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas /
T02TD2516E:28b-9: shar nas bskor phyogs su zlum por bskor ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol du khor yug chen po /
T02TD2516E:28b-10: de bzhin du zlum por thig btab la /
T02TD2516E:28b-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa las bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2516E:28b-12: brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la /
T02TD2516E:28b-13: yi ge ai las brgya byin mdog ser po'o //
T02TD2516E:28b-14: me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te /
T02TD2516E:28b-15: ram las me lha dmar po /
T02TD2516E:28b-16: aom ham las gshin rje mdog nag po /
T02TD2516E:28b-17: kam las srin po nag po //
T02TD2516E:28b-18: bam las chu lha dkar po /
T02TD2516E:28b-19: yam las rlung lha dud ka / phat las lus ngan po ser po /
T02TD2516E:28b-20: sumbha zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:28b-21: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ta bcug la bcings te dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab po //
T02TD2516E:28b-22: shin tu yang yun ring du bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:28b-23: de lta na yang gal te bgegs byed na /
T02TD2516E:28b-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas /
T02TD2516E:28b-25: lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02TD2516E:28b-26: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD2516E:28b-27: rkang pa g-yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te /
T02TD2516E:28b-28: h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis /
T02TD2516E:28b-29: g-yon pa brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:28b-30: bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te /
T02TD2516E:29a-1: rgya 'phangs te bstan la nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis /
T02TD2516E:29a-2: rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas /
T02TD2516E:29a-3: sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:29a-4: de lta bus ni bcom phu nyid 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:29a-5: yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02TD2516E:29a-6: de'i 'og tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas /
T02TD2516E:29a-7: rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par byas la ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yid kyis thugs ka nas phyung ste /
T02TD2516E:29a-8: badzra ham bandha zhes yid la brjod la /
T02TD2516E:29a-9: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dri'i thig le bdun byas te /
T02TD2516E:29a-10: thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas la /
T02TD2516E:29a-11: dbus ma dang tha ma yang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te /
T02TD2516E:29a-12: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ri dags la zhon pa mdog nag po /
T02TD2516E:29a-13: 'phags pa mi g-yo bas zhags pas bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:29a-14: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la /
T02TD2516E:29a-15: lhag ma thig le drug po ni de bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
T02TD2516E:29a-16: de nas kham phor aa las ri rab tu bsams la /
T02TD2516E:29a-17: de'i steng du aa nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa /
T02TD2516E:29a-18: dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um gi sa bon las byung ba mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:29a-19: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de /
T02TD2516E:29a-20: kham phor des ji skad du bshad pa'i theg le bdun dgab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:29a-21: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te /
T02TD2516E:29a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan nas /
T02TD2516E:29a-24: ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad par bsams te /
T02TD2516E:29a-25: de lta bus ni rlung rnams thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:29a-26: de la chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:29b-0: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyed @29b bskyad la /
T02TD2516E:29b-2: ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas /
T02TD2516E:29b-4: ram las me'i snying po bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:29b-7: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
T02TD2516E:29b-8: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas /
T02TD2516E:29b-9: bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02TD2516E:29b-10: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la /
T02TD2516E:29b-11: rkang pa g-yon pas spyi bo nas btsir la /
T02TD2516E:29b-13: na ma: sa mantra badzr'a n'am /
T02TD2516E:29b-14: tsanda mah'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um /
T02TD2516E:29b-15: tra ka ham mam zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:29b-16: dug dang ske tshe dang lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la me sa gdung bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:29b-17: me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang //
T02TD2516E:29b-18: gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02TD2516E:29b-19: tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang /
T02TD2516E:29b-20: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02TD2516E:29b-21: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las bya'o //
T02TD2516E:29b-22: yang aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa /
T02TD2516E:29b-25: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02TD2516E:29b-26: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02TD2516E:29b-28: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i khams kun du gang bar mdzad pa rnam par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:29b-29: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:29b-30: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsam pas /
T02TD2516E:29b-31: tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:29b-32: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02TD2516E:29b-33: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdun thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:29b-34: de ltar na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
T02TD2516E:29b-35: kham phor som btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02TD2516E:30a-0: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags @30a * //
T02TD2516E:30a-2: yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02TD2516E:30a-5: me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
T02TD2516E:30a-6: sreg blugs brgya'am sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30a-9: mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:30a-10: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi spyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la //
T02TD2516E:30a-11: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas ba'i phur bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la /
T02TD2516E:30a-12: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:30a-13: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas /
T02TD2516E:30a-14: gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo de nas me'i tshe ba zhi bar bshad par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:30a-15: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2516E:30a-16: de'i steng du padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo /
T02TD2516E:30a-17: de'i steng du bam gnyis nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kunda ltar dkar bar bzhugs te /
T02TD2516E:30a-18: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las /
T02TD2516E:30a-19: chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgyun babs pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30a-20: rdo rje can dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang /
T02TD2516E:30a-21: phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02TD2516E:30a-23: rdo rje 'jigs byed can dag gis /
T02TD2516E:30a-24: de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la /
T02TD2516E:30a-25: rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30a-26: yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis bgegs bzlog par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu h'um bzhis bton la /
T02TD2516E:30a-28: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang la /
T02TD2516E:30a-30: de nas hi zhes bya bas mig g-yas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:30a-31: g-yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:30a-32: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la /
T02TD2516E:30a-33: sgo rnams bya'o de nas tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:30a-34: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na /
T02TD2516E:30a-35: rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2516E:30a-36: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:30b-0: rdo rje'i @30b phyag rgya gnyis las ni //
T02TD2516E:30b-1: mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba //
T02TD2516E:30b-2: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02TD2516E:30b-3: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02TD2516E:30b-5: rdo rje nyi ma'i khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2516E:30b-6: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30b-7: aom badzra tsitra sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:30b-8: g-yas nas bskor bas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsi dgye bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:30b-10: de'i mi pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:30b-11: sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar ba'i rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o //
T02TD2516E:30b-12: khru drug par bya ba ni tshon rtsi'i ri mo chung tshad yin te /
T02TD2516E:30b-13: de phan chad khru bskyed pas rkang pa yang bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:30b-14: de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las /
T02TD2516E:30b-15: sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02TD2516E:30b-16: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste //
T02TD2516E:30b-17: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2516E:30b-19: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02TD2516E:30b-20: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02TD2516E:30b-21: ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02TD2516E:30b-22: shar phyogs su ni sngon po che //
T02TD2516E:30b-23: lhor ni ser po dang ldan pa //
T02TD2516E:30b-24: nub kyi phyogs ni dmar po ste //
T02TD2516E:30b-25: byang ni ljang gur yang dag ldan //
T02TD2516E:30b-26: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni //
T02TD2516E:30b-27: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02TD2516E:30b-28: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02TD2516E:30b-29: rab mnyam gzhag ste de yis bri //
T02TD2516E:30b-30: rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su //
T02TD2516E:30b-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la //
T02TD2516E:30b-32: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02TD2516E:30b-33: sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing //
T02TD2516E:30b-34: sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi ;
T02TD2516E:30b-35: / dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams su //
T02TD2516E:30b-36: rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog //
T02TD2516E:30b-37: bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya //
T02TD2516E:30b-38: dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu //
T02TD2516E:30b-39: rdo rje gom pas song nas ni //
T02TD2516E:30b-40: mi g-yo ba la sogs pa yi //
T02TD2516E:30b-41: sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag / mi g-yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2516E:30b-42: rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag / rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2516E:30b-43: rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag / tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2516E:30b-44: rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par bzhag / gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2516E:31a-1: rgya gram la sogs gzhag /'khor lo yi ni grva rnams su //
T02TD2516E:31a-2: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag / dkyil 'khor phyi rol grva rnams su //
T02TD2516E:31a-3: sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag / sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni //
T02TD2516E:31a-4: sgo srung bzhi yang gzhag par bya //
T02TD2516E:31a-5: dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni //
T02TD2516E:31a-6: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag / de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:31a-7: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02TD2516E:31a-8: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:31a-9: yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni //
T02TD2516E:31a-10: rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung //
T02TD2516E:31a-11: phyir byung nang du zhugs kyang rung /
T02TD2516E:31a-12: dam tshig nyams pa de mi 'gyur //
T02TD2516E:31a-13: de la bcom ldan 'das rnam par rdo rje snang mdzad ni /
T02TD2516E:31a-14: sku mdog dkar po seng ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2516E:31a-15: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2516E:31a-16: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD2516E:31a-19: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2516E:31a-20: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2516E:31a-21: zhal bzhi pa zhal dang po shar du gtsigs pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31a-22: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs yang de bzhin te /
T02TD2516E:31a-23: sku mdog kyang sngon po dang /
T02TD2516E:31a-27: glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2516E:31a-28: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang /
T02TD2516E:31a-29: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02TD2516E:31a-31: sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31a-32: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba /
T02TD2516E:31a-33: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2516E:31a-34: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa /
T02TD2516E:31a-35: zhal gcig pa rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po dang badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol la /
T02TD2516E:31a-36: bris pa ltar bar snang la mngon du bzhugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du phab ste gcig tu bya'o //
T02TD2516E:31a-37: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar /
T02TD2516E:31a-38: satva badzra zhes bya bas rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngon mo /
T02TD2516E:31a-39: rdo rje rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la /
T02TD2516E:31a-40: badzra a'a be sha aa zhes bya bas dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-0: @31b g-yas su ratna badzri zhes bya bas rin chen sems ma sku mdog ser mo /
T02TD2516E:31b-1: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-2: rgyab tu dharma badzri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar mo /
T02TD2516E:31b-3: padma dkar dmar 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-4: 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-5: kha ma bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chud pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-6: g-yon du karma badzri zhes bya bas /
T02TD2516E:31b-7: rdo rje las ma sku mdog ljang gu / sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-9: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni /
T02TD2516E:31b-10: phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-11: rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-12: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02TD2516E:31b-13: rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yin la /
T02TD2516E:31b-14: 'di dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:31b-15: rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-16: mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-17: g-yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-18: g-yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-19: rgyab tu ni rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-20: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-21: lhag ma ni shes pa kho nar zad do //
T02TD2516E:31b-22: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa /
T02TD2516E:31b-23: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhis stong du ma tshang ba /
T02TD2516E:31b-24: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha mnyam po go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-25: de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-26: lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-27: nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-28: byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2516E:31b-29: de nas 'di rnams kyi dgod pa'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2516E:31b-31: aom sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri shuddha dharma te ga gnas mudga te ma h'a na ya pa ri w'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:31b-32: zhes bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o //
T02TD2516E:32a-5: me tog / me tog gnyis pa /
T02TD2516E:32a-61: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:32a-65: yon tan lag / spos kyi glang po /
T02TD2516E:32a-94: lha'i me tog / don legs sems dpa'/
T02TD2516E:32a-95: chos kyi dbang phyug / blo gros grags pa /
T02TD2516E:32b-0: seng @32b ge'i tog / dus mkhyen rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:32b-6: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan /
T02TD2516E:32b-16: mun pa dang rnam par bral ba /
T02TD2516E:32b-25: ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog chos kyi 'byung gnas /
T02TD2516E:32b-38: spos kyi dbang phyug / shin tu grags pa /
T02TD2516E:32b-51: rin chen tog / the tshom rnam par spangs pa /
T02TD2516E:32b-67: sa'i dbang phyug / me tog spyan /
T02TD2516E:32b-75: rin chen tog / grags pa'i bla ma /
T02TD2516E:33a-31: glog gi tog / mchod pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02TD2516E:33a-32: nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshang ba ni shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:33a-78: dri ma med par grags pa /
T02TD2516E:33a-80: dga' ba'i tog / sgra gcan lha /
T02TD2516E:33b-23: rnam par nges pa'i blo gros /
T02TD2516E:33b-28: grags pa mchog / thugs rab tu gzhungs pa /
T02TD2516E:33b-35: glang chen seng ge / zla ba /
T02TD2516E:33b-54: yon tan rgya chen rin po che /
T02TD2516E:33b-58: seng ge'i phyag me tog bzang po /
T02TD2516E:33b-69: tshangs pa'i tog / tshogs can gtso bo /
T02TD2516E:33b-72: chos kyi dbang phyug / gzi brjid 'od /
T02TD2516E:33b-83: tog / yul 'khor me tog / chos kyi blo gros /
T02TD2516E:33b-84: rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa /
T02TD2516E:34a-11: ye shes mchog / tshangs par gnas /
T02TD2516E:34a-20: grags pa rmad du byung ba /
T02TD2516E:34a-80: rin po che'i mchog / thugs shin tu gzhungs pa /
T02TD2516E:34a-83: tshangs pa'i tog / zla ba'i gdugs /
T02TD2516E:34a-86: 'di rnams ni lho phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:34b-3: glog gi tog /'od zer rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:34b-23: rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:34b-34: mngon par shes pa'i tog / tog gi 'od /
T02TD2516E:34b-84: rnam par grol ba brnyes pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-8: rtsi sman rnam par grol ba'i tog /'od kyi mdzod /
T02TD2516E:35a-27: mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog / gzi brjid rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:35a-29: don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba /
T02TD2516E:35a-32: kun du dga' bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-37: rab tu sbyin par grags pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-41: mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid /
T02TD2516E:35a-45: gser mchog / rnam par grol ba'i gtsug / chos ldan /
T02TD2516E:35a-50: tsan dan mya ngan med pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-55: shes rab me tog / mkhas pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-57: tshangs pa dbyig / phyag na rin chen dbang ldan rdzogs par gsungs pa /
T02TD2516E:35a-68: grags pa 'od zer gyi dra ba /
T02TD2516E:35b-12: mchog tu mdzes par gshegs pa /
T02TD2516E:35b-18: spobs pa'i mdog / stegs bzang po /
T02TD2516E:35b-41: 'di rnams ni nub phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:35b-51: shes rab rnams dgod nga ro //
T02TD2516E:36a-18: gti mug med par gnas pa /
T02TD2516E:36a-22: gti mug med pa'i rgyal po //
T02TD2516E:36a-27: skye bo dga' bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2516E:36a-33: lha mang pos snyan par grags pa /
T02TD2516E:36a-44: phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa /
T02TD2516E:36a-45: bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:36a-51: byang chub yan lag me tog ; bkra shis legs don /
T02TD2516E:36a-68: thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan /
T02TD2516E:36a-72: chos kyi dbang phyug / lha thams cad pa /
T02TD2516E:36b-3: bag chags las rgal ba'i stobs /
T02TD2516E:36b-4: mi phyed pa'i blo mnga' ba /
T02TD2516E:36b-7: tshogs can grol ba'i rgyal po /
T02TD2516E:36b-14: rdzu 'phrul tog / skye dbang mtshungs pa /
T02TD2516E:36b-15: sa'i dbang phyug / nyi ma dgyes /
T02TD2516E:36b-23: chos kyi dbang phyug / tshangs pa'i dbyangs /
T02TD2516E:36b-35: spobs pa mtha' yas tog / brtul zhugs bstar ba /
T02TD2516E:36b-43: dul gnas me tog / spobs pa mtha' yas /
T02TD2516E:36b-62: dbyig gi mchog /'jig rten dga' ba /
T02TD2516E:36b-63: dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa /
T02TD2516E:36b-79: srid pa'i me tog / mdzod spu ldan pa /
T02TD2516E:37a-12: shes rab me tog / brtan pa'i dbyangs /
T02TD2516E:37a-17: gtsug phud snang bar mdzad pa /
T02TD2516E:37a-18: 'di rnams ni byang phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37a-22: mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros /
T02TD2516E:37a-26: ye shes tog /'od dpag tu med pa /
T02TD2516E:37a-33: kun du bzang po zhes bya ba /
T02TD2516E:37a-34: bcu drug po ji ltar mngon par dga' ba'i sku mdog dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-36: rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-37: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37a-38: phyogs bzhir yang rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad /
T02TD2516E:37a-39: khru drug gam bdun gyi tshad tsam rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas ba /
T02TD2516E:37a-40: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-41: dril bu dang dar la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD2516E:37a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37a-43: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi char /
T02TD2516E:37a-44: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-46: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-47: gser 'od dam pa klog tu gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:37a-48: chos smra ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas ltar ci nus pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37a-49: de lta bus ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-51: phyogs mtshams brgyad du spos snod brgyad las ga pur dang /
T02TD2516E:37a-53: tu ru ska dang tsandan la sogs pa rgyun mi 'chad par gtul par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37a-54: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bkod nas /
T02TD2516E:37a-55: phyi rol nye 'khor kun du dris nye bar byugs la /
T02TD2516E:37a-56: me tog gi sel ma bkram nas /
T02TD2516E:37b-0: @37b rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02TD2516E:37b-1: rdo rje shugs kyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:37b-4: yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lhag pa dang /
T02TD2516E:37b-5: ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bltas la /
T02TD2516E:37b-6: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
T02TD2516E:37b-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la /
T02TD2516E:37b-9: rdo rje gar byas nas blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37b-10: aom badzra satva h'um zhes kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa kho nar bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37b-12: rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas //
T02TD2516E:37b-13: sangs rgyas ma tshang yongs su bskor //
T02TD2516E:37b-14: lhag pa gang yin 'dor mdzad pas //
T02TD2516E:37b-17: de'i rjes la yi ge h'um las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:37b-18: de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni ;
T02TD2516E:37b-19: / rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas //
T02TD2516E:37b-20: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi'o //
T02TD2516E:37b-21: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02TD2516E:37b-22: aom badzro gha t'a sa ma ya /
T02TD2516E:37b-24: rdo rje mdzub mo yang dag sbyar //
T02TD2516E:37b-25: sbyar ba bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02TD2516E:37b-26: rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni //
T02TD2516E:37b-27: sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no //
T02TD2516E:37b-29: sa las byas pa'i bum pa /
T02TD2516E:37b-30: rtsa ba mi gnag pa gsus pa che ba mgrin pa ring ba /
T02TD2516E:37b-36: padma r'a ga ste rin po che thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:37b-41: shve ta aa pa ra dzi ta ste sman thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:37b-48: spos chu dri zhim pa dang /
T02TD2516E:37b-49: me tog dkar po dri zhim pas yongs su bkang la /
T02TD2516E:37b-50: dris kun du byugs pa'i me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02TD2516E:37b-51: mgul pa ras dkar po bzang pos bcings pa /
T02TD2516E:37b-52: 'dab ma dang 'bras bu dri zhim pas kha brgyan pa /
T02TD2516E:37b-53: sngar bsnyen pa byas pas mchod yon phul la /
T02TD2516E:37b-54: rdo rje bsdams pa la sems ma rdo rje mas yongs su gzung ba'i rdo rje me tog gi lhug ma las /
T02TD2516E:37b-56: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas /
T02TD2516E:38a-0: @38a * // badzrod ka h'um zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas la /
T02TD2516E:38a-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag go //
T02TD2516E:38a-2: gnyis pa la yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02TD2516E:38a-3: 'jug pa'i sgor mngon par phyogs par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:38a-4: chu des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38a-5: 'jug pa'i dus su slob ma byang chub sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings pa'am /
T02TD2516E:38a-7: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bum pa la yang /
T02TD2516E:38a-8: so so rang rang gi mtshan mas mtshan la /
T02TD2516E:38a-9: de rnams kyi rang rang gi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:38a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi mtshams su gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38a-11: de rnams kyi yang phyi rol du ni bum pa gang ba'o //
T02TD2516E:38a-12: ma rnyed par gyur na bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
T02TD2516E:38a-13: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02TD2516E:38a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bum pa dang /
T02TD2516E:38a-15: bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:38a-19: las kyi rdo rjes mtshan la /
T02TD2516E:38a-20: rang gi rigs kyi sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas pa'i bum pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2516E:38a-21: bum pa gang ba bzhi dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38a-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad mngon sum lta bur bsams la /
T02TD2516E:38a-23: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2516E:38a-24: phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02TD2516E:38a-26: rdo rje sems ma ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38a-27: de nas rdo rje'i chu ji lta bar 'thungs la /
T02TD2516E:38a-28: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:38a-29: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i bu tshur gyis lag pa g-yas pa'i sems ma rdo rje ma'i gung mo yang dang yang du dral zhing /
T02TD2516E:38a-30: aa zhes bya bas ji lta ba bzhin du brtan par byas la /
T02TD2516E:38a-32: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02TD2516E:38a-33: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD2516E:38a-34: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02TD2516E:38a-35: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02TD2516E:38a-36: zhes bya ba'i bar gyi cho ga sngar bshad pa rnams byas la /
T02TD2516E:38a-37: 'og nas bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2516E:38a-40: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyang blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38b-0: de nas @38b bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2516E:38b-1: bdag rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming gang yang rung ba brjod la /
T02TD2516E:38b-2: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02TD2516E:38b-3: de'i gnas su badzra dh'a tu aa zhes pas /
T02TD2516E:38b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid du phab la /
T02TD2516E:38b-6: de nas badzra dh'a tu ra ham byas pas rdo rje dbyings su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38b-7: de bzhin du rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02TD2516E:38b-8: de'i gnas su badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya bas /
T02TD2516E:38b-9: rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid la phab ste /
T02TD2516E:38b-11: de nas badzra a'a be sh'a ham zhes bya bas dril bu der bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:38b-12: de ltar na rdo rjes bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:38b-13: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2516E:38b-14: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02TD2516E:38b-15: se gol mang po brdabs bgyis la //
T02TD2516E:38b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:38b-17: aom badzra sa ma ya dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02TD2516E:38b-18: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi ;
T02TD2516E:38b-19: / phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02TD2516E:38b-20: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02TD2516E:38b-21: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:38b-22: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas /
T02TD2516E:38b-23: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:38b-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs thams cad bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2516E:38b-27: ra ba dang dra ba byas te /
T02TD2516E:38b-28: dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad la /
T02TD2516E:38b-29: yi ge gnyis kyis go cha'i srung bas thams cad yang dag par bsrungs nas /
T02TD2516E:38b-30: mchod yon phul la sngon du 'gro ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis blta ba byas la /
T02TD2516E:38b-31: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2516E:38b-32: aa ham zhes brjod par bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:38b-33: rang rang gi snying po dang /
T02TD2516E:38b-34: sngags kyis kyang mthar yang dag par bskul la /
T02TD2516E:38b-35: chos dang las kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas btag ste /
T02TD2516E:38b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nas /
T02TD2516E:38b-37: bskal ba bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:38b-38: de la rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i rang gi snying po nyid chos kyi phyag rgya yin no //
T02TD2516E:38b-41: chos dang las ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-0: phyag rgya chen po ni rdo rje la sogs pa'i nang du tshud pa'i bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin @39a * //
T02TD2516E:39a-2: yang na de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs can no //
T02TD2516E:39a-3: g-yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur bkan la /
T02TD2516E:39a-4: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bod dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi mthe'u chung nas brtsams nas phye la /
T02TD2516E:39a-5: thal mo khong stong du byas pa 'di ni ;
T02TD2516E:39a-6: byams pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD2516E:39a-7: 'di rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02TD2516E:39a-8: rig pa de dag nyid de rnams kyi ljags la bkod pa 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:39a-9: yi ge aa las rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la /
T02TD2516E:39a-10: bris pa dang de'i rjes su mthun par /
T02TD2516E:39a-11: de rnams phyag rgya chen por bcing pa ni /
T02TD2516E:39a-12: de rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:39a-13: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:39a-14: bris ba dang rjes su mthun pa kho nar de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39a-15: rig pa de nyid kyang spyi'i yin nom //
T02TD2516E:39a-16: de nas mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:39a-22: thams cad la spyir zung gcig dbul ba'am /
T02TD2516E:39a-23: bla re rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-24: grva bzhir ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs gdags pa dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-25: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyang yi ge aom dang rdo rje sems dpa' lan bdun bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39a-27: bzhi'am me tog thams cad kyang snga ma bzhin du mngon par bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:39a-28: aom badzra spha ra na kham zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39a-29: dril rig pa bzlas pa'i dris byugs la ;
T02TD2516E:39a-30: dri zhim pa'i dri bzang po thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-31: bdug spos kyi rig pa bzlas pa'i /
T02TD2516E:39a-32: ga pur aa ka ru dang tu ru ska dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-33: tsandan la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i bdug pa gtul ba'i sbol snod 'bum mam /
T02TD2516E:39a-37: bcu las nyung ba ni mi bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39a-39: khri'am stong ngam brgya'am bcu'am bzhi la snga ma bzhin du mar me'i sngags bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-40: sva sti ka la sogs pa'i lha bshos kyi kha zas bza' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:39a-41: bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gang ba'i snod 'bum mam /
T02TD2516E:39b-3: bcu la aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bzlas te /
T02TD2516E:39b-4: lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-5: rol mo'i cha byad stong phrag bcu snying la yi ge h'um dang rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo brdungs pa lta bu'i phyag rgya rnams kyis /
T02TD2516E:39b-6: rol mo bcu po 'di lta ste /
T02TD2516E:39b-17: brdung ba'i tshul du byed pas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-18: phyi rol du gar mkhan dang /
T02TD2516E:39b-22: rna rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang /
T02TD2516E:39b-23: aom dang h'um mngon par bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-24: de bzhin du dar dpyangs dpyang bar bya ba dang /
T02TD2516E:39b-25: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02TD2516E:39b-27: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa /
T02TD2516E:39b-28: zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa /
T02TD2516E:39b-29: rta dang glang po che dang /
T02TD2516E:39b-30: ba lang gi khyu shin tu btags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-31: rta babs yid du 'ong ba'i dril bu la sogs pa dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-32: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pas kyang yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2516E:39b-33: dngos grub thams cad grub pa'i phyir /
T02TD2516E:39b-34: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-35: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:39b-36: phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:39b-37: 'bras yos bcas shing til dang bcas //
T02TD2516E:39b-38: 'bras chan me tog chu dang bcas //
T02TD2516E:39b-39: sran chen bcas shing mang du bya //
T02TD2516E:39b-40: snum khur la sogs bza' ba rnams //
T02TD2516E:39b-41: zhes bya ba'i gtor ma la /
T02TD2516E:39b-42: aa k'a ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas nas /
T02TD2516E:39b-44: gtor ma gsum gsum gtor bar bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:39b-47: mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang mtha' mar dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-48: de la dang por re zhig mandala rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:39b-50: de nas dam tshig bstan la /
T02TD2516E:40a-1: pas legs par mchod la gtor ma phul te /
T02TD2516E:40a-2: de nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-3: de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te /
T02TD2516E:40a-4: shar phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02TD2516E:40a-5: rkang pa g-yas pa brkyang pa'i tshul gyis 'dug nas /
T02TD2516E:40a-6: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan la /
T02TD2516E:40a-7: g-yas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya sta zur phyogs su bzhag ste g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni /
T02TD2516E:40a-8: brgya byin spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-9: de mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar ma byas pa ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-10: rkang pa g-yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:40a-11: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang pa ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-13: na mo badzra sya tsa de shi di shi badzra p'a ni ra ksha raksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40a-15: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum por bkug ste /
T02TD2516E:40a-16: gung mo'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la /
T02TD2516E:40a-17: mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa 'di ni /
T02TD2516E:40a-18: me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-19: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gi ngos la /
T02TD2516E:40a-21: me lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-22: phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bong ngos la btsugs te ;
T02TD2516E:40a-23: phyir drag tu brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-24: 'di'i sngags ni aagni ae hye hi ka pa li ka pa li /
T02TD2516E:40a-25: dzva dzva la da kha shi khi tod r'u p'a ksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40a-26: gshin rje'i phyogs su bltas nas snyim pa mdun du bzhag ste /
T02TD2516E:40a-27: sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba la khu tshur bcings nas srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te gshibs la g-yas te /
T02TD2516E:40a-28: de nang du bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:40a-29: gshin rje spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-30: srin lag gnyis yang phyi rol du de bzhin du gshibs te /
T02TD2516E:40a-31: bsgrengs la snying gar gzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-32: de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40a-33: sngags ni ya ma ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40a-34: bden bral gyi phyogs su bltas te /
T02TD2516E:40a-36: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las /
T02TD2516E:40a-37: mdzub mo dang gung mo ral gri 'dra bar gshibs te /
T02TD2516E:40b-0: bsgreng la bzhag / lag pa g-yon pa yang @40b de ltar byas te /
T02TD2516E:40b-1: sta zur logs su bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:40b-2: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug ste /
T02TD2516E:40b-3: g-yab pa ni bden bral spyan drangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-4: phyag rgya de nyid las g-yon pa sta zur logs su ral gri 'dra bar bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:40b-5: bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-6: spyan drangs ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni /
T02TD2516E:40b-8: sngags ni sarba bh'u ta bha yam ka ra ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40b-9: chu lha'i phyogs su rkang ba mnyam par 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:40b-10: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcings nas /
T02TD2516E:40b-11: mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis gcig tu sbyar te /
T02TD2516E:40b-12: zhags mig ltar byas la g-yon pa'i khu tshur yang de ltar byas te /
T02TD2516E:40b-14: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yab pa ni /
T02TD2516E:40b-15: chu lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-16: phyag rgya de nyid las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur gyi tshul du bzhag pa las /
T02TD2516E:40b-17: zhags mig ltar byas pa ni chu lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-19: mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-20: sngags ni tri tri pu sha /
T02TD2516E:40b-21: tri tri shi gi to li bi ru p'a ksha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40b-22: rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:40b-23: lag pa g-yon pa khu tshur bcangs te /
T02TD2516E:40b-24: gung mo bsgreng pa'i tshigs dang por /
T02TD2516E:40b-25: mdzub mo bkug pa'i thor to btsugs la /
T02TD2516E:40b-26: lag pa g-yas brkyang de bzhin du bya ste /
T02TD2516E:40b-27: sta zur logs su bzhag cing /
T02TD2516E:40b-29: rlung lha spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-30: de nyid las mthe bong snga ma bzhin du gzhag pa ni rlung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:40b-31: spyan drang pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang pa ni /
T02TD2516E:40b-34: aom s'a sam kh'a kh'a khu kha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:40b-35: ku be ra la mngon du bltas te /
T02TD2516E:40b-37: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la /
T02TD2516E:40b-38: rdo rje bcing pa nang du bzlog ste /
T02TD2516E:40b-39: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la brkyang /
T02TD2516E:40b-40: de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis so sor bzhag nas /
T02TD2516E:40b-41: gung mo gnyis rdo rje ltar bkug ste /
T02TD2516E:40b-42: g-yabs pa ni ku be ra spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-0: phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du rdo rje bcings @41a * //
T02TD2516E:41a-1: pa'i tshul du bzhag pa de ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-2: ku be ra'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-3: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2516E:41a-4: gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-7: aom ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41a-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:41a-9: lag pa gcig tu sbyar te ;
T02TD2516E:41a-10: thal mo sbyar ba byas la /
T02TD2516E:41a-11: srin lag dang mthe'u chung nang du bkug ste /
T02TD2516E:41a-12: bsnol ba gung mo gnyis gshibs te /
T02TD2516E:41a-13: bsgreng ba'i rgyab logs su mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bya /
T02TD2516E:41a-14: mthe bong gnyis par du gshibs te bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:41a-15: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse mo sprad nas nang du g-yab pa ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-16: dbang ldan gyi spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-17: de nyid las snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-18: dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-19: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-21: aom dzum dzum shi ba sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41a-22: steng gi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:41a-23: g-yon brkyang pa'i gnas pas 'dug la thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-24: tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-25: de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-27: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-30: aom au rdham brahma ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41a-31: s'urya ya gra ha aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41a-32: tsa ndra ya na ksha tra ya aa dhi pa ta ye sv'a h'a ;
T02TD2516E:41a-33: rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la /
T02TD2516E:41a-34: lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te sor mo rnams par mtshams med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar te /
T02TD2516E:41a-35: mthe bong zlum por byas la /
T02TD2516E:41a-37: sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drangs pa ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-38: 'og gi sa'i lha mo spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-39: spyan drang pa'i phyag rgya las /
T02TD2516E:41a-40: snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni /
T02TD2516E:41a-42: mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2516E:41a-44: aa dhi pri thvi de bya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41a-45: aa su re bhya: sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:41b-1: de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la /
T02TD2516E:41b-2: bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la /
T02TD2516E:41b-3: bgegs med par mdzod cig / las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad slar gtang ngo //
T02TD2516E:41b-4: yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:41b-5: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02TD2516E:41b-6: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02TD2516E:41b-7: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-8: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02TD2516E:41b-9: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor bcas rnams la /
T02TD2516E:41b-10: bdag gi bus mos la btsugs nas su //
T02TD2516E:41b-11: thal mo sbyar te khyod la gsol 'debs kyis /
T02TD2516E:41b-12: gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-13: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-14: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-15: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-16: chu po kun dang chu po'i mdo rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-17: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-18: mtsho dang rdzing dang ldeng ka'i chu ngogs dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-19: g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-20: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-21: khang stong dag dang lha yi khang ba dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-22: gtsug lag khang ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
T02TD2516E:41b-23: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02TD2516E:41b-24: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-25: lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-26: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
T02TD2516E:41b-27: dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po'am //
T02TD2516E:41b-28: seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-29: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-30: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang ;
T02TD2516E:41b-31: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02TD2516E:41b-32: rab tu dgyes te mgu bar gyur nas su //
T02TD2516E:41b-33: me tog phreng dang dri dang bdug pa dang //
T02TD2516E:41b-34: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas //
T02TD2516E:41b-35: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02TD2516E:42a-2: de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas ni //
T02TD2516E:42a-3: de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD2516E:42a-4: shar phyogs rdo rje can de lha tshogs bcas //
T02TD2516E:42a-5: gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2516E:42a-6: me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po'i bdag / chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste //
T02TD2516E:42a-7: dbang ldan lha de 'byung po'i bdag po dang //
T02TD2516E:42a-8: steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang //
T02TD2516E:42a-9: lha rnams dang ni sa yi klu rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:42a-10: ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la //
T02TD2516E:42a-11: sa sa so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams //
T02TD2516E:42a-12: rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang //
T02TD2516E:42a-13: rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su //
T02TD2516E:42a-14: rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang //
T02TD2516E:42a-15: nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu //
T02TD2516E:42a-16: me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas //
T02TD2516E:42a-17: 'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang ;
T02TD2516E:42a-18: / bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02TD2516E:42a-19: de nas nye reg byas la /
T02TD2516E:42a-20: dpal rdo rje sems dpas zhi pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas /
T02TD2516E:42a-21: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
T02TD2516E:42a-22: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying pos ni /
T02TD2516E:42a-23: sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul yo //
T02TD2516E:42a-24: de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la /
T02TD2516E:42a-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02TD2516E:42a-26: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02TD2516E:42a-27: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:42a-28: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyid //
T02TD2516E:42a-29: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs pa la /
T02TD2516E:42a-31: ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo //
T02TD2516E:42a-34: sdig pa chen po bgyis pa yang mchis te /
T02TD2516E:42a-35: de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:42a-36: bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:42a-38: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la sogs pa dang dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:42a-39: sngar bshad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can yang mchis te /
T02TD2516E:42b-0: de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs @42b pa rnams kyis bsam la thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:42b-1: bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang glu dang gad mo dang /
T02TD2516E:42b-3: kha zas spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pas /
T02TD2516E:42b-4: lha gzhan gyi rig sngags dang /
T02TD2516E:42b-5: dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par gyur pa /
T02TD2516E:42b-6: bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02TD2516E:42b-8: rangs pa rnams 'byung ba der ni /
T02TD2516E:42b-9: bslabs pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2516E:42b-10: de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing /
T02TD2516E:42b-11: gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing /
T02TD2516E:42b-12: bde ba dang yid bde ba myang ba bgyis pa dang /
T02TD2516E:42b-13: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du /
T02TD2516E:42b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo //
T02TD2516E:42b-15: bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can /
T02TD2516E:42b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
T02TD2516E:42b-18: shes rab dam pa grub pa'i thabs kyis /
T02TD2516E:42b-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na /
T02TD2516E:42b-22: sa rnams kyang 'dab cing nyon mongs pa dag kyang mchis te /
T02TD2516E:42b-23: de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu /
T02TD2516E:42b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par gyur pa /
T02TD2516E:42b-25: bla na med pa thams cad du 'grub par dka' ba yang ma lags na /
T02TD2516E:42b-26: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:42b-27: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:42b-28: de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung pa'i dge bsnyen nam /
T02TD2516E:42b-30: dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs pa /
T02TD2516E:42b-31: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa /
T02TD2516E:42b-32: slob dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te /
T02TD2516E:43a-0: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa @43a * //
T02TD2516E:43a-2: / slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa //
T02TD2516E:43a-4: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2516E:43a-5: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-6: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-7: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02TD2516E:43a-8: rdo rje srung ba yongs su bzlas la /
T02TD2516E:43a-9: stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon zhing /
T02TD2516E:43a-11: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo srung bzhis /
T02TD2516E:43a-12: bzlas pa'i gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02TD2516E:43a-13: phyag bzhi byed du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:43a-14: yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas /
T02TD2516E:43a-15: slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02TD2516E:43a-16: lag na me tog thogs pa de nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:43a-18: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2516E:43a-22: gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-23: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i //
T02TD2516E:43a-24: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD2516E:43a-25: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2516E:43a-26: slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la //
T02TD2516E:43a-27: sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02TD2516E:43a-29: thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer cher //
T02TD2516E:43a-30: gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2516E:43a-31: gsang ba chen por bsdus pa ni //
T02TD2516E:43a-32: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02TD2516E:43a-33: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2516E:43a-34: skal pa chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-35: mtshan rnams kyis ni rgyas btab cing //
T02TD2516E:43a-36: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2516E:43a-37: sangs rgyas kun gyi yid 'ong ba //
T02TD2516E:43a-38: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-39: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba //
T02TD2516E:43a-40: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02TD2516E:43a-41: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur //
T02TD2516E:43a-42: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD2516E:43a-43: de nas slob dpon gyis rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:43a-44: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02TD2516E:43a-45: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin zhing //
T02TD2516E:43a-46: dam tshig sdom dang gsang ba yi //
T02TD2516E:43a-48: de nas yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:43a-49: gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2516E:43a-50: gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni //
T02TD2516E:43b-0: bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod @43b dam ;
T02TD2516E:43b-1: / des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-2: yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad cas brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:43b-3: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2516E:43b-4: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02TD2516E:43b-5: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2516E:43b-6: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02TD2516E:43b-7: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag / blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2516E:43b-8: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02TD2516E:43b-9: shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do //
T02TD2516E:43b-10: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-11: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02TD2516E:43b-12: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2516E:43b-13: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02TD2516E:43b-14: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2516E:43b-15: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2516E:43b-16: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02TD2516E:43b-17: sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2516E:43b-18: 'di ni rin chen rigs dag pa'i //
T02TD2516E:43b-19: dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2516E:43b-20: phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2516E:43b-21: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-23: dam pa'i sdom pa yin par gsungs //
T02TD2516E:43b-24: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2516E:43b-25: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2516E:43b-26: yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis //
