T02TD2516E:43b-27: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-28: gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02TD2516E:43b-29: phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02TD2516E:43b-30: spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2516E:43b-31: rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-32: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02TD2516E:43b-33: nyin re bzhin ni bklag par bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-34: gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2516E:43b-36: khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-37: ma byin par ni blang mi bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-38: 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing //
T02TD2516E:43b-39: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2516E:43b-40: phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi //
T02TD2516E:43b-41: chang ni rnam par spang bar bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-42: sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa //
T02TD2516E:43b-43: bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //
T02TD2516E:43b-44: dam pa nyi bar bsten bya zhing //
T02TD2516E:43b-45: rnal 'byor ba rnams bsnyen bkur bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-46: lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //
T02TD2516E:43b-47: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD2516E:43b-48: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni //
T02TD2516E:43b-49: ci nus par ni rjes su skyong //
T02TD2516E:43b-50: theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya //
T02TD2516E:43b-51: sems can don la rgyab mi phyogs //
T02TD2516E:43b-52: 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang //
T02TD2516E:44a-2: lha dang lha min gsang ba la //
T02TD2516E:44a-3: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02TD2516E:44a-4: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //
T02TD2516E:44a-6: 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02TD2516E:44a-7: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD2516E:44a-8: des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:44a-9: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02TD2516E:44a-10: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD2516E:44a-11: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02TD2516E:44a-12: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02TD2516E:44a-13: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02TD2516E:44a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas //
T02TD2516E:44a-15: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod ;
T02TD2516E:44a-16: / ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44a-17: gang zhig sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la /
T02TD2516E:44a-18: deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par mi bya ste /
T02TD2516E:44a-19: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02TD2516E:44a-20: dbang bskur ba yang mi bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44a-21: 'jug pa tsam cig byed du gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:44a-22: de nas aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:44a-23: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02TD2516E:44a-24: dam pa bdag gis bskyed nas su //
T02TD2516E:44a-25: de yi snying gar snying po ni //
T02TD2516E:44a-26: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02TD2516E:44a-27: su ra te sa ma ya stam ho badzra sid dhya ya th'a su kham /
T02TD2516E:44a-28: de nas rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2516E:44a-29: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2516E:44a-30: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02TD2516E:44a-31: gdong dri zhim par byas la /
T02TD2516E:44a-33: des phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02TD2516E:44a-34: sa ma ya stv'am zhes bya ba 'dis /
T02TD2516E:44a-35: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:44a-36: de nas gung mo gnyis kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
T02TD2516E:44a-37: sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44a-38: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas kyang /
T02TD2516E:44a-39: rang rang gi sgo nas badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02TD2516E:44a-43: zhes bya bas dgug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:44a-47: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas /
T02TD2516E:44a-49: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:44a-50: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02TD2516E:44a-51: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa yang thob na /
T02TD2516E:44b-0: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci @44b dgos te /
T02TD2516E:44b-1: de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya yis /
T02TD2516E:44b-2: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02TD2516E:44b-3: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang /
T02TD2516E:44b-4: gyen du bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:44b-6: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis /
T02TD2516E:44b-7: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:44b-8: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02TD2516E:44b-9: ma na'i snying po 'di lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma 'thung du bcug la /
T02TD2516E:44b-11: de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:44b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2516E:44b-13: snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzad //
T02TD2516E:44b-14: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD2516E:44b-15: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD2516E:44b-16: aom badzra au da ka tha zhes bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44b-17: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:44b-18: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis /
T02TD2516E:44b-19: ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so //
T02TD2516E:44b-20: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02TD2516E:44b-21: de nas yi ge aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar por bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44b-22: de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar yi ge aa rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44b-23: yi ge h'um gis kyang slob ma rdo rje sems dpa' rdul dang bral zhing shin tu dang bar bsams la /
T02TD2516E:44b-24: snying ga dang dpral ba dang lce dang spyi bor /
T02TD2516E:44b-25: h'um hr'im hr'i: kam zhes bya ba las rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par byas la /
T02TD2516E:44b-26: sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga dang /
T02TD2516E:44b-27: slob ma'i snying gar dbye bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:44b-28: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje aa zhes bya bas phyung la ;
T02TD2516E:44b-29: slob ma'i snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:44b-30: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste /
T02TD2516E:44b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig /
T02TD2516E:45a-0: @45a * // ces smros shig / de nas slob dpon gyis myur du rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2516E:45a-2: 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:45a-3: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02TD2516E:45a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02TD2516E:45a-5: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02TD2516E:45a-6: de ring nyid du 'bab par shog / badzra a'a we sha aa: zhes bya ba bcu nas lan brgya'i bar du brjod na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45a-7: de nas gal te 'bab par ma gyur na de'i tshe khro po'i khu tshur bcings la /
T02TD2516E:45a-8: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:45a-9: badzras tva a'a a'a a'a a'a: zhes bya ba 'di yang brjod la /
T02TD2516E:45a-10: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'od zer dmar po 'bab pas kun du khyab pas kun du gang bar bsams la /
T02TD2516E:45a-11: lan brgya'i bar du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45a-12: de lta bus kyang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02TD2516E:45a-13: de'i tshe rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02TD2516E:45a-14: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02TD2516E:45a-15: nam mkha'i phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa'i steng na dpal rnam par snang mdzad de la dbab par bya ba'i phyir bris pas /
T02TD2516E:45a-16: yi ge h'um gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'bebs par mdzad pa dang /
T02TD2516E:45a-17: 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2516E:45a-18: yi ge h'um gis bteg par bsam pa dang /
T02TD2516E:45a-19: de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa shar phyogs la sogs par bzhugs pas /
T02TD2516E:45a-20: h'um hr'im hr'i: aa zhes bya ba'i rang rang gis bon gyi 'od zer gyi tshogs yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsams la /
T02TD2516E:45a-21: badzra stva a'a a'a a'a a'a: zhes bya ba yang de bzhin du bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45a-22: gal te sdig pa shin tu che bas de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02TD2516E:45a-23: de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas yang dang yang du sdig pa dral la /
T02TD2516E:45a-24: yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me //
T02TD2516E:45a-25: rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi //
T02TD2516E:45a-26: mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la /
T02TD2516E:45a-27: til sreg pas ni sdig bsregs shing //
T02TD2516E:45a-28: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:45a-30: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02TD2516E:45a-31: h'um dbus su bsam pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-0: de @45b nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje de'i lus la 'bab pas /
T02TD2516E:45b-1: sdig pa rnams bsregs par gyur par bsams na nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45b-2: yang de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
T02TD2516E:45b-3: de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-4: babs na skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45b-5: de nas babs par shes nas /
T02TD2516E:45b-6: slob dpon gyis kyi rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2516E:45b-9: kye rdo rje las zhes bya bas /
T02TD2516E:45b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug go //
T02TD2516E:45b-11: yang nri rtya badzra zhes bya bas sems dpa'i gar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-12: gal te babs na dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'ching du bcug la /
T02TD2516E:45b-13: de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-14: de bzhin du rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching du bcug la /
T02TD2516E:45b-15: de'i tshe rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa'i bar du'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-16: de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dgongs pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45b-17: de nas 'dis mngon par 'dod pa thams cad bri bar bya ste /
T02TD2516E:45b-18: babs pa de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la /
T02TD2516E:45b-19: bru hi badzra zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:45b-20: de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45b-21: de nas pra t'i tstsha badzra ho: zhes bya bas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-22: de nas gang du phreng ba de babs par gyur pa de 'di la 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2516E:45b-23: de nas aom pra ti gri hna tvam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la zhes bya bas phreng ba de de'i mgo la bcing bar bya'o ;
T02TD2516E:45b-25: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02TD2516E:45b-26: mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad //
T02TD2516E:45b-27: mig ni thams cad 'byed mdzad de //
T02TD2516E:45b-28: rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med //
T02TD2516E:45b-29: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya ba'i das gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-30: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02TD2516E:45b-31: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-32: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02TD2516E:45b-33: dbab pa'i phyag rgya slob ma'i snying gar dgrol du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:45b-34: de nas phyi rol gyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang ngam /
T02TD2516E:46a-0: phyi rol du shar phyogs kyi sgo la @46a * //
T02TD2516E:46a-1: mngon par phyogs par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02TD2516E:46a-2: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi dang /
T02TD2516E:46a-3: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas slob ma dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02TD2516E:46a-4: rang gi phyag rgya chen pos zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste /
T02TD2516E:46a-5: dbang bskur ba la mchod yon bstabs nas dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02TD2516E:46a-7: ba dan la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:46a-8: dung dang rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46a-9: de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pas mngon par dga' bar bya zhing /
T02TD2516E:46a-10: dang por re zhig chu'i dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2516E:46a-11: de nas ni phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02TD2516E:46a-15: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur nas /
T02TD2516E:46a-16: yang me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:46a-17: sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02TD2516E:46a-18: slob mas rdo rje thal mo bskor bas slob dpon la phyag byas la yon gyi mchog phul te /
T02TD2516E:46a-19: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46a-20: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba la ji skad bstan pa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:46a-21: de'i lus la dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bkod de /
T02TD2516E:46a-22: spyi bor dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:46a-23: aom ma h'a su kha badzra satva dza: h'um bam ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing chus dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46a-24: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02TD2516E:46a-25: slob ma la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02TD2516E:46a-26: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba sbyin zhing /
T02TD2516E:46a-27: gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad la lung bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46a-28: de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bshad par ste /
T02TD2516E:46a-29: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa bcug la /
T02TD2516E:46a-30: dkyil 'khor dang lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:46a-31: slob dpon gyis las thams cad slob par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:46b-0: 'di tsam gyis ni @46b gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar gyur pa yin te /
T02TD2516E:46b-2: de nas rim pa bar ma brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:46b-3: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru gnyis tsam yongs su dor bas /
T02TD2516E:46b-4: dbus ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed tshad kyi gru bzhi pa sgo nub tu bltas pa 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la /
T02TD2516E:46b-5: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bris shing /
T02TD2516E:46b-6: de'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha dog dmar po 'od zer dmar po 'phro ba bri bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46b-7: de nas dkyil 'khor de me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2516E:46b-8: seng ge'i khri'am khri'u zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dar gyis bkab la /
T02TD2516E:46b-9: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2516E:46b-10: slob ma snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2516E:46b-11: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos der bzhag nas seng ge'i khri'i steng du bla re bre ba dang /
T02TD2516E:46b-12: g-yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46b-13: gdugs dkar po rin po che'i tog can la yi ge h'um bzlas pa dang /
T02TD2516E:46b-15: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs la /
T02TD2516E:46b-16: nam mkha'i mdzod yongs su bzlas te /
T02TD2516E:46b-18: mchod yon byin nas me tog la sogs pa dang ;
T02TD2516E:46b-19: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod cing /
T02TD2516E:46b-23: zangs dung la sogs pa'i rol mo'i phyag rgyas byin gyi brlabs pa dang /
T02TD2516E:46b-24: phyi rol du glu dang gar la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46b-25: yon gyi mchog kyang blangs la /
T02TD2516E:46b-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs de'i mgo bor bzhag ste bkra shis gdon par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:46b-27: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
T02TD2516E:46b-28: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa'i //
T02TD2516E:46b-29: sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T02TD2516E:46b-30: bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o //
T02TD2516E:46b-31: de yas nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g-yo ba //
T02TD2516E:46b-32: 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa //
T02TD2516E:46b-33: chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa //
T02TD2516E:46b-34: de ni 'jig rten dge zhing bkra shis gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2516E:47a-1: thos pa'i bkra shis phyug / mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas //
T02TD2516E:47a-2: tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi //
T02TD2516E:47a-3: de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o //
T02TD2516E:47a-4: sems can kun la phan zhing byang chub mnga' ba po //
T02TD2516E:47a-5: don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa //
T02TD2516E:47a-6: tshogs kyi las dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba //
T02TD2516E:47a-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-8: 'gro la phan phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i //
T02TD2516E:47a-9: gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te ;
T02TD2516E:47a-10: / dbang bcas lhas bskor ba yi bkra shis gang byung ba'i //
T02TD2516E:47a-11: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-12: lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bi'i tshal //
T02TD2516E:47a-13: lha mang dag gis bstan par mgon po bltams pa na //
T02TD2516E:47a-14: srid pa mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba'i //
T02TD2516E:47a-15: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-16: grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du //
T02TD2516E:47a-17: lhums nas bltams pa ston pa bde gshegs zas gtsang sras //
T02TD2516E:47a-18: myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47a-19: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-20: grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD2516E:47a-21: rmad du grags pa chen po lha yis mngon bstod pa //
T02TD2516E:47a-22: bsam yas dge bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47a-23: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-24: dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste //
T02TD2516E:47a-25: dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs //
T02TD2516E:47a-26: lha yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47a-27: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog / rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing //
T02TD2516E:47a-28: bee d'u rya ltar sngon pa'i rtsva bting steng bzhugs te //
T02TD2516E:47a-29: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47a-30: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47a-31: chu bo'i 'gram na rtsva sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2516E:47a-32: shin tu rmad byung ba yi sred pa sel mdzad pa //
T02TD2516E:47a-33: klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47b-0: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed @47b shog / shing rgyal drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyis bdud kyi phyogs //
T02TD2516E:47b-1: mang po btul tshes steng dang ni nam mkha' la //
T02TD2516E:47b-2: bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba //
T02TD2516E:47b-3: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-4: sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i gdan bzhugs te ;
T02TD2516E:47b-5: / nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnams btul ba //
T02TD2516E:47b-6: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-7: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-8: grong khyer b'a r'a na s'ir drang srong mchog bzhugs nas //
T02TD2516E:47b-9: chos kyi 'khor lo phyogs bstan pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47b-10: lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-11: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-12: bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-13: bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-14: bcom ldan sh'akya thub pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-15: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-16: mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom par byed pa dang //
T02TD2516E:47b-17: 'gro la bde ba skyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag / nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-18: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-19: 'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te //
T02TD2516E:47b-20: tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs //
T02TD2516E:47b-21: sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47b-22: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-24: mand'a ra yi me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-25: lha tshogs rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang //
T02TD2516E:47b-26: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-27: lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos phyag byas pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-28: mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa //
T02TD2516E:47b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang /
T02TD2516E:47b-30: bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog //
T02TD2516E:47b-31: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod la /
T02TD2516E:47b-32: dang po ni bum pa gang bas so //
T02TD2516E:47b-33: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po zlos shing de'i bum pas so //
T02TD2516E:48a-0: de'i rjes la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis @48a * //
T02TD2516E:48a-2: des dbang bskur zhing 'thung du yang gzhug pa dang /
T02TD2516E:48a-3: bum pa lhag ma rnams kyis kyang chu'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro //
T02TD2516E:48a-4: de la sbyor ba ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:48a-5: aom badzra aam ku sha aom badzra satva aa bhishinytsa zhes bya ba nas /
T02TD2516E:48a-6: aom badzra satva aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
T02TD2516E:48a-7: aom ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48a-8: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma dang 'dra ba yin te /
T02TD2516E:48a-10: de nas dbang bskur ba'i rim pa rgyas par brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:48a-11: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02TD2516E:48a-12: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48a-13: de nas rin po che'i mig thur ram /
T02TD2516E:48a-14: gser la sogs pa'i thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste tshig 'di skad du gsal bar brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:48a-15: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02TD2516E:48a-16: 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba ltar //
T02TD2516E:48a-17: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD2516E:48a-18: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD2516E:48a-20: aom badzra ne tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i: zhes bya ba yin no //
T02TD2516E:48a-21: de la me long blangs la chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48a-22: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD2516E:48a-23: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2516E:48a-24: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD2516E:48a-25: rgyu dang las las kun du 'byung //
T02TD2516E:48a-26: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02TD2516E:48a-27: de ltar chos 'di shes par gyis //
T02TD2516E:48a-28: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD2516E:48a-29: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02TD2516E:48a-30: de nas dril bu blangs la dkrol te /
T02TD2516E:48a-31: chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD2516E:48a-32: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD2516E:48a-33: nam mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2516E:48a-34: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD2516E:48a-35: zhes bya bas dril bu sbyin no //
T02TD2516E:48a-36: aa zhes bya ba ni dril bu sbyin pa'i snying po yin no //
T02TD2516E:48a-37: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod de /
T02TD2516E:48a-38: ho zhes bya bas gzhu byin la /
T02TD2516E:48a-40: steng du gcig dang 'og tu gcig 'phen du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48a-41: yang me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD2516E:48a-43: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD2516E:48b-0: sangs rgyas kun @48b bdag rang nyid ni //
T02TD2516E:48b-1: bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD2516E:48b-2: gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po byang chub kyi sems ni 'di yin par shes par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48b-3: de la me long 'di 'dzin du gzhug pa'i sngags so //
T02TD2516E:48b-5: de nas rkang pa gnyis kyi bar du chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag la /
T02TD2516E:48b-6: lag pa g-yas par dung byin la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD2516E:48b-7: deng nas brtsams te sems bskyed pa /
T02TD2516E:48b-8: tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2516E:48b-9: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02TD2516E:48b-10: skyob pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2516E:48b-11: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02TD2516E:48b-12: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02TD2516E:48b-13: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD2516E:48b-14: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2516E:48b-15: gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02TD2516E:48b-16: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02TD2516E:48b-17: phan thogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02TD2516E:48b-18: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02TD2516E:48b-19: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02TD2516E:48b-20: ces bya ba rdo rje 'khor lo dang /
T02TD2516E:48b-21: rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi yi ge dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:48b-23: 'jig rten kun las khyad par du //
T02TD2516E:48b-24: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:48b-25: ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul gyur pa //
T02TD2516E:48b-26: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD2516E:48b-27: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02TD2516E:48b-30: nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhes tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba sbyin no //
T02TD2516E:48b-31: de nas dngos po thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo'i bdag nyid can gyi gzengs bstod nas /
T02TD2516E:48b-32: kun sangs rgyas su bdag bsgrub pa'o ;
T02TD2516E:48b-33: / rdo rje ming dbang bskur bas kyang //
T02TD2516E:48b-34: de bzhin gshegs par lung bstan nyid //
T02TD2516E:48b-35: aom 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin //
T02TD2516E:48b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2516E:48b-37: srid pa kun du bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD2516E:48b-38: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD2516E:48b-39: kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa siddha sa ma ya stvam bh'ur bhu wa snga: de la gzengs bstod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2516E:48b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcing ste /
T02TD2516E:48b-41: g-yon pas chos gos 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la /
T02TD2516E:48b-42: g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-0: de nas slob ma rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par @49a * //
T02TD2516E:49a-2: gang la gzengs bstod par byas pa 'di dag phyag rgya chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas lung bstan par byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:49a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad do //
T02TD2516E:49a-4: de ltar gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02TD2516E:49a-5: phyag rgya chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa dang sngags kyi stobs yin no zhes dad par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-6: dbugs dbyung ba lhag ma ni dpal mchog dang po las shes par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-7: de nas thams cad la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i ye shes thams cad bslab pa nyid du bya ste /
T02TD2516E:49a-8: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02TD2516E:49a-9: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02TD2516E:49a-10: de bas 'dod la chags bral bar //
T02TD2516E:49a-11: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig / ma h'a sa ma ya ha na phat ces bya ba'i dam tshig chen po'i sngags 'di yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-12: de nas rang gi lha'i sngags byin la /
T02TD2516E:49a-13: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-14: de nas khyod kyis gzhan phyag rgyal mi mkhas pa gang la yang phyag rgya gcig kyang ston par ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02TD2516E:49a-15: 'di ltar sems can de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba la sbyor bar byed kyang /
T02TD2516E:49a-16: de rnams kyis dngos grub ji lta ba bzhin du thob par ma gyur pa dang /
T02TD2516E:49a-17: de nas de som nyi za bar gyur pas /
T02TD2516E:49a-18: yang ba ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas /
T02TD2516E:49a-19: sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur la /
T02TD2516E:49a-20: rgyu des khyod kyang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49a-21: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2516E:49a-22: me tog la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag par mchod la /
T02TD2516E:49a-23: slob ma rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgo ste /
T02TD2516E:49b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa @49b thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing bdug spos la sogs pa ci 'dod par mchod pa byed du bcug la /
T02TD2516E:49b-1: ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la 'byor ba ci yod pa'i bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa thams cad dang /
T02TD2516E:49b-2: dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis tshim par byas la /
T02TD2516E:49b-3: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD2516E:49b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-5: de nas yang thams cad la su la yang smra bar ma byed cig ces bsgo la mna'i snying po brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-6: de nas zhugs pa rnams slar btang la /
T02TD2516E:49b-7: yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02TD2516E:49b-8: sgeg mo la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la phyag bya ste /
T02TD2516E:49b-9: mchod yon phul nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi don du bsngos la /
T02TD2516E:49b-10: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
T02TD2516E:49b-11: sems ma rdo rje ma bcings te /
T02TD2516E:49b-13: lan bdun bskor ba byas la /
T02TD2516E:49b-14: snga ma bzhin du gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa byas nas /
T02TD2516E:49b-15: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor phyags la /
T02TD2516E:49b-16: dman ma la sogs pa chu por dor bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-17: de nas h'um ba zhis phur bu thams cad bton la /
T02TD2516E:49b-18: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ni sarba aartha s'a dha ne sv'a h'a /
T02TD2516E:49b-19: zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu dang gzugs brnyan thams cad bkrus la bu gu yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-20: de nas 'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i las thams cad pa'i thab khung byas la /
T02TD2516E:49b-22: sa bdag dang sems can thams cad la dmigs te /
T02TD2516E:49b-24: de nas slob ma'i gtso bo g-yon logs su bzhag ste /
T02TD2516E:49b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags kyis mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-26: de nas sangs rgyas spyan gyis brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-27: de nas phyag rgya de nyid bcings la mar dang zho dang 'dres pa'i til gyis sbyin sreg brgya bya'o //
T02TD2516E:49b-28: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin bzlas pa'i chus spyi bor gtor nas de nyid bzlas pa'i srung skud mkhrig ma g-yon par bcing bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:50a-1: khar lag pas gtugs te spyan gyi sngags lan brgya bzla bar bya'o //
T02TD2516E:50a-2: gzhan dag la ni ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyin sreg lan bdun bdun bya'o //
T02TD2516E:50a-3: de nas bsang gtor dang srung skud bcing ba dang snying gar gtugs pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02TD2516E:50a-4: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog ;
T02TD2516E:50a-5: / dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa //
T02TD2516E:50a-6: rdo rje thams cad 'byung byas las //
T02TD2516E:50a-7: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02TD2516E:50a-8: des ni 'jig rten ma lus pa //
T02TD2516E:50a-9: kun dga' snying po rig pa mchog / sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po //
T02TD2516E:50a-10: gtso chen rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /
T02TD2516E:50a-11: dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa /
T02TD2516E:50a-12: theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud chen po las btus thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2516E:50a-13: rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD2516E:50a-14: rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snying po'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2516E:50a-16: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya buddha shr'i sh'anti dang /
T02TD2516E:50a-17: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
